engChrName: Welcome, players. We shall now commence the third round of the game.
engSearchText:
Welcome, players. We shall now commence the third
round of the game.
jpnChrName: ──ようこそ、参加者の方々。
jpnSearchText: ──ようこそ、参加者の方々。

engChrName: My name is Olympia. I have been tasked by Almata with supervising the lower floors of the arena.
engSearchText:
My name is Olympia. I have been tasked by Almata
with supervising the lower floors of the arena.
jpnChrName: アルマータより“委託”され、 下層の担当者を務めるオランピアです。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータより“委託”され、
下層の担当者を務めるオランピアです。

engChrName: It's that girl with the giant doll.
engSearchText: It's that girl with the giant doll.
jpnChrName: あの人形使いの……
jpnSearchText: あの人形使いの……

engChrName: As we expected.
engSearchText: As we expected.
jpnChrName: ……想定通り、ですね。
jpnSearchText: ……想定通り、ですね。

engChrName: Your fates, as well as this city's, will be decided by the end of today.
engSearchText:
Your fates, as well as this city's, will be decided by the
end of today.
jpnChrName: “ゲーム”も最終日── 今日で全ての決着がつくでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
“ゲーム”も最終日──
今日で全ての決着がつくでしょう。

engChrName: If you wish to advance to the palace, you must first face me.
engSearchText:
If you wish to advance to the palace, you must first
face me.
jpnChrName: 王宮跡への道を進みたいならば 私を撃破するしかありません。
jpnSearchText:
王宮跡への道を進みたいならば
私を撃破するしかありません。

engChrName: To do so, you will need to gather twenty keycards. That is the only condition for this round.
engSearchText:
To do so, you will need to gather twenty keycards.
That is the only condition for this round.
jpnChrName: アクセスキーを２０個── 第３フェーズはそれだけが条件です。
jpnSearchText:
アクセスキーを２０個──
第３フェーズはそれだけが条件です。

engChrName: Your time limit is five hours.
engSearchText: Your time limit is five hours.
jpnChrName: タイムリミットは５時間──
jpnSearchText: タイムリミットは５時間──

engChrName: Should you fail to defeat me within that time, I have been instructed to detonate the bombs spread throughout the city.
engSearchText:
Should you fail to defeat me within that time, I have
been instructed to detonate the bombs spread
throughout the city.
jpnChrName: オーバーした時点で、各街区の 爆弾を起爆する命令を受けています。
jpnSearchText:
オーバーした時点で、各街区の
爆弾を起爆する命令を受けています。

engChrName: I care little as to how this ends, so I will leave the decision to you.
engSearchText:
I care little as to how this ends, so I will leave the
decision to you.
jpnChrName: 私はどちらでも構いません。 後はお好きなように──
jpnSearchText:
私はどちらでも構いません。
後はお好きなように──

engChrName: Guess the remaining teams have no choice but to go at each other's throats.
engSearchText:
Guess the remaining teams have no choice but to go
at each other's throats.
jpnChrName: ハッ、後は残ったチーム同士で 本格的な潰しあいって訳か。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、後は残ったチーム同士で
本格的な潰しあいって訳か。

engChrName: Well, it is the final day, so that makes sense.
engSearchText: Well, it is the final day, so that makes sense.
jpnChrName: まさに最終日に相応しい内容だね。
jpnSearchText: まさに最終日に相応しい内容だね。

engChrName: I suppose it only makes sense. It is the final day, after all.
engSearchText:
I suppose it only makes sense. It is the final day,
after all.
jpnChrName: ふふ、最終日に相応しい内容ですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、最終日に相応しい内容ですね。

engChrName: Makes sense. It's the final day, after all.
engSearchText: Makes sense. It's the final day, after all.
jpnChrName: フフ、最終日に相応しい内容かな？
jpnSearchText: フフ、最終日に相応しい内容かな？

engChrName: Works for me. I love a good bloodbath.
engSearchText: Works for me. I love a good bloodbath.
jpnChrName: クハハ、最終日らしい内容じゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText: クハハ、最終日らしい内容じゃねぇか。

engChrName: There aren't many teams left, but that don't mean today'll be a walk in the park. Might be the opposite.
engSearchText:
There aren't many teams left, but that don't mean
today'll be a walk in the park. Might be the opposite.
jpnChrName: 参加勢力もかなり減った…… なんとか隙を見て勝ち残るしかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
参加勢力もかなり減った……
なんとか隙を見て勝ち残るしかねぇ。

engChrName: We'll find a way, though—as we always do. We just gotta get those cards, take her out, and deal with Dantès and Melchior in the palace.
engSearchText:
We'll find a way, though—as we always do. We just
gotta get those cards, take her out, and deal with
Dantès and Melchior in the palace.
jpnChrName: あの人形娘を突破して王宮跡に乗り込み、 ジェラールたちを止める──
jpnSearchText:
あの人形娘を突破して王宮跡に乗り込み、
ジェラールたちを止める──

engChrName: Basically, our goal's the same as it was before.
engSearchText: Basically, our goal's the same as it was before.
jpnChrName: やること自体は変わらねえ。
jpnSearchText: やること自体は変わらねえ。

engChrName: Right.
engSearchText: Right.
jpnChrName: はい……！
jpnSearchText: はい……！

engChrName: I'm ready to go!
engSearchText: I'm ready to go!
jpnChrName: 準備完了、ですっ。
jpnSearchText: 準備完了、ですっ。

engChrName: Well, this is it, y'all. However this ends, it ends today. So let's get on out there and take home the gold!
engSearchText:
Well, this is it, y'all. However this ends, it ends today.
So let's get on out there and take home the gold!
jpnChrName: 泣いても笑っても今日が最後だ。 最後まで突き進むぞ……！
jpnSearchText:
泣いても笑っても今日が最後だ。
最後まで突き進むぞ……！

engChrName: Meanwhile...
engSearchText: Meanwhile...
jpnChrName: 同時刻───
jpnSearchText: 同時刻───

engChrName: Haaaaaaaaah!
engSearchText: Haaaaaaaaah!
jpnChrName: おらああああっ！！
jpnSearchText: おらああああっ！！

engChrName: Ooooooooh!
engSearchText: Ooooooooh!
jpnChrName: おおおおおおっ……！
jpnSearchText: おおおおおおっ……！

engChrName: Ooooooooh!
engSearchText: Ooooooooh!
jpnChrName: おおおおおおっ……！
jpnSearchText: おおおおおおっ……！

engChrName: Tch. We're getting nowhere fast.
engSearchText: Tch. We're getting nowhere fast.
jpnChrName: ちっ、キリがねぇな……！
jpnSearchText: ちっ、キリがねぇな……！

engChrName: I expected some resistance, but I didn't anticipate it being so fierce.
engSearchText:
I expected some resistance, but I didn't anticipate it
being so fierce.
jpnChrName: ……思った以上に厄介ですね。
jpnSearchText: ……思った以上に厄介ですね。

engChrName: Perhaps you should have.
engSearchText: Perhaps you should have.
jpnChrName: 当然であろう。
jpnSearchText: 当然であろう。

engChrName: Perhaps you should have.
engSearchText: Perhaps you should have.
jpnChrName: 当然のことだ。
jpnSearchText: 当然のことだ。

engChrName: I should note, I'm not saying I underestimated you.
engSearchText: I should note, I'm not saying I underestimated you.
jpnChrName: 過小評価したつもりもありませんが……
jpnSearchText: 過小評価したつもりもありませんが……

engChrName: Worry not. I didn't take it that way.
engSearchText: Worry not. I didn't take it that way.
jpnChrName: そういうことではない。
jpnSearchText: そういうことではない。

engChrName: Tell me, do you remember fighting our other squad in the first round?
engSearchText:
Tell me, do you remember fighting our other squad in
the first round?
jpnChrName: まさか忘れたとは言うまい── “ゲーム”の初日、ウチの二番隊をやったな？
jpnSearchText:
まさか忘れたとは言うまい──
“ゲーム”の初日、ウチの二番隊をやったな？

engChrName: I am not suggesting you did.
engSearchText: I am not suggesting you did.
jpnChrName: それは分かっている。
jpnSearchText: それは分かっている。

engChrName: Tell me, do you remember your fight against our other unit? That was two days ago now.
engSearchText:
Tell me, do you remember your fight against our
other unit? That was two days ago now.
jpnChrName: だが、初日で我々の第２分隊と 戦っていたことは憶えているか。
jpnSearchText:
だが、初日で我々の第２分隊と
戦っていたことは憶えているか。

engChrName: Sure do. We kicked their asses.
engSearchText: Sure do. We kicked their asses.
jpnChrName: 憶えてるぜ、アタシらが勝った。
jpnSearchText: 憶えてるぜ、アタシらが勝った。

engChrName: Your squad here is many orders of magnitude stronger than the one we faced.
engSearchText:
Your squad here is many orders of magnitude
stronger than the one we faced.
jpnChrName: まさか一番隊の実力が数段も上とは 思いませんでしたが。
jpnSearchText:
まさか一番隊の実力が数段も上とは
思いませんでしたが。

engChrName: Flattering, but I disagree with your assessment.
engSearchText: Flattering, but I disagree with your assessment.
jpnChrName: ハハ、それは違う。 そこまでの差はあるまい。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、それは違う。
そこまでの差はあるまい。

engChrName: Our other squad may have struggled against you, but they learned quite a bit from their defeat.
engSearchText:
Our other squad may have struggled against you, but
they learned quite a bit from their defeat.
jpnChrName: 星杯の守護騎士……確かに強い。 だが、戦士たちもただで負けてはいまい。
jpnSearchText:
星杯の守護騎士……確かに強い。
だが、戦士たちもただで負けてはいまい。

engChrName: You see, it is not altogether uncommon for us to face the same opponents many times on the battlefield.
engSearchText:
You see, it is not altogether uncommon for us to face
the same opponents many times on the battlefield.
jpnChrName: 戦場（いくさば）で同じ相手と相まみえるのは 我らにとっては日常茶飯事。
jpnSearchText:
戦場（いくさば）で同じ相手と相まみえるのは
我らにとっては日常茶飯事。

engChrName: Even if we know we cannot win a battle, we will still learn, observe, and gather information on our foes.
engSearchText:
Even if we know we cannot win a battle, we will still
learn, observe, and gather information on our foes.
jpnChrName: たとえ負け戦でも、相手の力を見極め 次に備えるまでが“戦”のうち。
jpnSearchText:
たとえ負け戦でも、相手の力を見極め
次に備えるまでが“戦”のうち。

engChrName: Then we share that information with the others in our tribe—and ensure our victory in our next encounter.
engSearchText:
Then we share that information with the others in
our tribe—and ensure our victory in our
next encounter.
jpnChrName: 同胞と情報を共有することもな。
jpnSearchText: 同胞と情報を共有することもな。

engChrName: Your main squad is many orders of magnitude stronger than the one we faced.
engSearchText:
Your main squad is many orders of magnitude
stronger than the one we faced.
jpnChrName: まさか第１分隊の実力が数段も上とは 思いませんでしたが。
jpnSearchText:
まさか第１分隊の実力が数段も上とは
思いませんでしたが。

engChrName: Believe it or not, the difference in strength between our units is not so different as you might think.
engSearchText:
Believe it or not, the difference in strength between
our units is not so different as you might think.
jpnChrName: それは違う──そこまでの差はない。
jpnSearchText: それは違う──そこまでの差はない。

engChrName: Our other squad may have lost against you, but they did not do so in vain.
engSearchText:
Our other squad may have lost against you, but they
did not do so in vain.
jpnChrName: 星杯の守護騎士……確かに強いが、 彼らもただで負けたわけではない。
jpnSearchText:
星杯の守護騎士……確かに強いが、
彼らもただで負けたわけではない。

engChrName: We are well accustomed to facing the same opponents in battle more than once.
engSearchText:
We are well accustomed to facing the same
opponents in battle more than once.
jpnChrName: 戦場で同じ相手と遭遇し戦うのは 猟兵にとってはよくあることだ。
jpnSearchText:
戦場で同じ相手と遭遇し戦うのは
猟兵にとってはよくあることだ。

engChrName: And we are prepared to tackle a losing battle head on because we can always learn from our enemy.
engSearchText:
And we are prepared to tackle a losing battle head on
because we can always learn from our enemy.
jpnChrName: 故にたとえ負けると分かっていても──
jpnSearchText: 故にたとえ負けると分かっていても──

engChrName: Then we can share that knowledge with the rest of our corps...
engSearchText:
Then we can share that knowledge with the rest of
our corps...
jpnChrName: 相手を分析し対策を立て、次に備えた 準備をするまでが作戦行動のうちだ。
jpnSearchText:
相手を分析し対策を立て、次に備えた
準備をするまでが作戦行動のうちだ。

engChrName: ...and be victorious in our next bout.
engSearchText: ...and be victorious in our next bout.
jpnChrName: 団全体で情報を共有することもな。
jpnSearchText: 団全体で情報を共有することもな。

engChrName: Ah, I see now. That tactic gives you quite the advantage here, then.
engSearchText:
Ah, I see now. That tactic gives you quite the
advantage here, then.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど、初日の戦いで 僕たちの戦い方は分析済みですか。
jpnSearchText:
……なるほど、初日の戦いで
僕たちの戦い方は分析済みですか。

engChrName: No wonder you've been able to exploit our openings so damn well.
engSearchText:
No wonder you've been able to exploit our openings
so damn well.
jpnChrName: チッ、通りで一々隙を突いて来て やりづれぇと思ったぜ！
jpnSearchText:
チッ、通りで一々隙を突いて来て
やりづれぇと思ったぜ！

engChrName: Now, it wouldn't be as effective on a jaeger corps, since most have adopted a similar strategy...
engSearchText:
Now, it wouldn't be as effective on a jaeger corps,
since most have adopted a similar strategy...
jpnChrName: 同じ猟兵なら“対策の対策”を立てるのも また当然のことだが……
jpnSearchText:
同じ猟兵なら“対策の対策”を立てるのも
また当然のことだが……

engChrName: ...but it's clear the Gralsritter hasn't done so.
engSearchText: ...but it's clear the Gralsritter hasn't done so.
jpnChrName: 騎士団にはその習慣がないようだな？
jpnSearchText: 騎士団にはその習慣がないようだな？

engChrName: Now, it wouldn't be as effective on another jaeger corps, since most have adopted a similar strategy...

corps, since most have adopted a similar strategy...

同じ猟兵なら“対策の対策”を立てるのも
また当然のことだが……

engChrName: ...but it's clear the Gralsritter hasn't done so.
engSearchText: ...but it's clear the Gralsritter hasn't done so.
jpnChrName: 騎士団にはその習慣がないようだな？
jpnSearchText: 騎士団にはその習慣がないようだな？

engChrName: Naturally. Our organization serves a very different purpose from yours.
engSearchText:
Naturally. Our organization serves a very different
purpose from yours.
jpnChrName: 専門が違いますからね。
jpnSearchText: 専門が違いますからね。

engChrName: We have less experience fighting other humans—this fight has made that crystal clear.
engSearchText:
We have less experience fighting other humans—this
fight has made that crystal clear.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、“人”相手の実戦経験の差が 出ましたか……一つ勉強になりました。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、“人”相手の実戦経験の差が
出ましたか……一つ勉強になりました。

engChrName: But don't think for a second that you'll actually beat us. Your stupid little tricks will only get you so far.
engSearchText:
But don't think for a second that you'll actually
beat us. Your stupid little tricks will only get you
so far.
jpnChrName: だが、まさかそんな小手先のことで アタシらに勝てるとは思ってねえよな？
jpnSearchText:
だが、まさかそんな小手先のことで
アタシらに勝てるとは思ってねえよな？

engChrName: We're only just getting started. Now that we've worn you down, we will fully go on the offensive.
engSearchText:
We're only just getting started. Now that we've worn
you down, we will fully go on the offensive.
jpnChrName: ここまでは体力を削るための作戦。 ──そろそろ総攻撃と行かせてもらおう。
jpnSearchText:
ここまでは体力を削るための作戦。
──そろそろ総攻撃と行かせてもらおう。

engChrName: We're only just getting started. Now that we've worn you down, we will fully go on the offensive.
engSearchText:
We're only just getting started. Now that we've worn
you down, we will fully go on the offensive.
jpnChrName: ここまでは体力を削るための作戦。 ──では、総攻撃と行かせてもらおう。
jpnSearchText:
ここまでは体力を削るための作戦。
──では、総攻撃と行かせてもらおう。

engChrName: Now that's what I'm talking about. Bring it on, you old coot!
engSearchText:
Now that's what I'm talking about. Bring it on, you
old coot!
jpnChrName: ヘッ……そう来なくっちゃな！
jpnSearchText: ヘッ……そう来なくっちゃな！

engChrName: It's time to settle this.
engSearchText: It's time to settle this.
jpnChrName: そろそろ決着ですね……！
jpnSearchText: そろそろ決着ですね……！

engChrName: We shall end this now! Shine, Falcons of the Sun!
engSearchText: We shall end this now! Shine, Falcons of the Sun!
jpnChrName: ここで決めるぞ──！ 赫（かがや）け、《太陽の鷹（エル＝アルコン）》の戦翼！
jpnSearchText:
ここで決めるぞ──！
赫（かがや）け、《太陽の鷹（エル＝アルコン）》の戦翼！

engChrName: Sir!
engSearchText: Sir!
jpnChrName: 応（ウーラ）！！
jpnSearchText: 応（ウーラ）！！

engChrName: Victory will be ours! All units, assume the Dual Lancer formation!
engSearchText:
Victory will be ours! All units, assume the Dual
Lancer formation!
jpnChrName: 勝機を逃すな──！ 戦形を《双槍騎兵（ドッペルランツェレイター）》へ！
jpnSearchText:
勝機を逃すな──！
戦形を《双槍騎兵（ドッペルランツェレイター）》へ！

engChrName: Ja!
engSearchText: Ja!
jpnChrName: Ｊａ（ヤー）！！
jpnSearchText: Ｊａ（ヤー）！！

engChrName: Let's do this, Leon!
engSearchText: Let's do this, Leon!
jpnChrName: こっちも行くぞ、リオン！！
jpnSearchText: こっちも行くぞ、リオン！！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnSearchText: ええ──！！

engChrName: Raaaaaaaaah!
engSearchText: Raaaaaaaaah!
jpnChrName: オラアアアアアアア──！！
jpnSearchText: オラアアアアアアア──！！

jpnChrName: なッ！？
jpnSearchText: なッ！？
ッ！！

engChrName: What...happened?!
engSearchText: What...happened?!
jpnChrName: これは……！！
jpnSearchText: これは……！！

engChrName: What...happened?!
engSearchText: What...happened?!
jpnChrName: これは……！！
jpnSearchText: これは……！！

engChrName: You bastard!
engSearchText: You bastard!
jpnChrName: テメエは──！！
jpnSearchText: テメエは──！！

engChrName: What are you doing here?
engSearchText: What are you doing here?
jpnChrName: 鏖殺のアリオッチ！！
jpnSearchText: 鏖殺のアリオッチ！！

engChrName: I don't recall breaking any rules.
engSearchText: I don't recall breaking any rules.
jpnChrName: 今までも何度か出てきたが、 このタイミングか……！
jpnSearchText:
今までも何度か出てきたが、
このタイミングか……！

engChrName: I don't recall breaking any rules.
engSearchText: I don't recall breaking any rules.
jpnChrName: 今までも何度か出てきたが、 このタイミングとは……！
jpnSearchText:
今までも何度か出てきたが、
このタイミングとは……！

engChrName: Nah, you didn't. I just felt like crashin' the party.
engSearchText: Nah, you didn't. I just felt like crashin' the party.
jpnChrName: よお！　あまりにも楽しそうなもんで、 つい混ざってみたくなっちまった。
jpnSearchText:
よお！　あまりにも楽しそうなもんで、
つい混ざってみたくなっちまった。

engChrName: Grabbed myself a few party favors, too.
engSearchText: Grabbed myself a few party favors, too.
jpnChrName: ついでにコイツもいただいてくぜ。
jpnSearchText: ついでにコイツもいただいてくぜ。

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: まさかッ！？
jpnSearchText: まさかッ！？

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: まさかッ！？
jpnSearchText: まさかッ！？

engChrName: Ah! Our keycards!
engSearchText: Ah! Our keycards!
jpnChrName: さっきので……！
jpnSearchText: さっきので……！

engChrName: How the hell'd you do that?! And you can't do this shit! That's gotta be breakin' some kinda rule!
engSearchText:
How the hell'd you do that?! And you can't do
this shit! That's gotta be breakin' some kinda rule!
jpnChrName: テメェ……デカいナリして かすめ取りやがったのか！？
jpnSearchText:
テメェ……デカいナリして
かすめ取りやがったのか！？

engChrName: Were you listenin' to a word Olympia said? The only condition for this round is gettin' twenty cards.
engSearchText:
Were you listenin' to a word Olympia said? The only
condition for this round is gettin' twenty cards.
jpnChrName: アクセスキーを２０個──それだけが 条件だってオランピアも言ってただろうが？
jpnSearchText:
アクセスキーを２０個──それだけが
条件だってオランピアも言ってただろうが？

engChrName: She never said I couldn't get in on the action and take a few of 'em, too.
engSearchText:
She never said I couldn't get in on the action and take
a few of 'em, too.
jpnChrName: クク、そこに俺が絡むななんざ誰が言った？
jpnSearchText: クク、そこに俺が絡むななんざ誰が言った？

engChrName: Bah. We should have anticipated some degree of interference.
engSearchText:
Bah. We should have anticipated some degree
of interference.
jpnChrName: そういうことか…… 最初から気付くべきであったな。
jpnSearchText:
そういうことか……
最初から気付くべきであったな。

engChrName: Bah. We should have anticipated some degree of interference.
engSearchText:
Bah. We should have anticipated some degree
of interference.
jpnChrName: そういうことか…… 最初から気付くべきだったな。
jpnSearchText:
そういうことか……
最初から気付くべきだったな。

engChrName: Yet we were too focused on the battle in front of us— leaving ourselves wide open for an ambush.
engSearchText:
Yet we were too focused on the battle in front of us—
leaving ourselves wide open for an ambush.
jpnChrName: 目の前に集中して、 完全に油断しましたね……
jpnSearchText:
目の前に集中して、
完全に油断しましたね……

engChrName: Ooh, you look mad, girl. You're free to come at me, but do you really wanna try your luck?
engSearchText:
Ooh, you look mad, girl. You're free to come at me,
but do you really wanna try your luck?
jpnChrName: クク、力ずくで奪い返すかよ？ やれるモンだったらだがなァ……
jpnSearchText:
クク、力ずくで奪い返すかよ？
やれるモンだったらだがなァ……

engChrName: Damn right, I do. I'm gonna hand you your ass.
engSearchText: Damn right, I do. I'm gonna hand you your ass.
jpnChrName: 上等だ……！ 今すぐブッ飛ばしてやるよ！！
jpnSearchText:
上等だ……！
今すぐブッ飛ばしてやるよ！！

engChrName: ...Celis, I believe we should cut our losses this time.
engSearchText: ...Celis, I believe we should cut our losses this time.
jpnChrName: ──セリスさん、 ここは退きましょう。
jpnSearchText:
──セリスさん、
ここは退きましょう。

engChrName: What?! Are you off your rocker?! He's one of the reasons we're here!
engSearchText:
What?! Are you off your rocker?! He's one of the
reasons we're here!
jpnChrName: はぁ？　なに言ってる！ こいつもターゲットだろうが！
jpnSearchText:
はぁ？　なに言ってる！
こいつもターゲットだろうが！

engChrName: Be that as it may, our odds of defeating him are slim in our present state.
engSearchText:
Be that as it may, our odds of defeating him are slim
in our present state.
jpnChrName: しかし消耗した状態で彼を 完全に制圧できる保証はありません。
jpnSearchText:
しかし消耗した状態で彼を
完全に制圧できる保証はありません。

engChrName: Also, we have not completed our analysis on the artifact's capabilities. We can't afford to be too hasty.
engSearchText:
Also, we have not completed our analysis on the
artifact's capabilities. We can't afford to be too hasty.
jpnChrName: そもそもあの古代遺物の能力分析は まだ出来ていません──焦りは禁物かと。
jpnSearchText:
そもそもあの古代遺物の能力分析は
まだ出来ていません──焦りは禁物かと。

engChrName: ...Fine.
engSearchText: ...Fine.
jpnChrName: ………ち、分かったよ。
jpnSearchText: ………ち、分かったよ。

engChrName: We're at our limit, too.
engSearchText: We're at our limit, too.
jpnChrName: こちらもこれ以上は厳しいか……
jpnSearchText: こちらもこれ以上は厳しいか……

engChrName: We're at our limit, too.
engSearchText: We're at our limit, too.
jpnChrName: こちらもこれ以上は厳しいか……
jpnSearchText: こちらもこれ以上は厳しいか……

engChrName: Party's over, huh? Then I'm outta here.
engSearchText: Party's over, huh? Then I'm outta here.
jpnChrName: ハン……そんじゃ俺は行くぜ？
jpnSearchText: ハン……そんじゃ俺は行くぜ？

engChrName: You guys can still go after someone else's cards. I'm not an official team, so you're not out of the game.
engSearchText:
You guys can still go after someone else's cards.
I'm not an official team, so you're not out of
the game.
jpnChrName: ま、俺は正当なチームじゃねえから 他から奪って続行すんのもアリだがな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、俺は正当なチームじゃねえから
他から奪って続行すんのもアリだがな。

engChrName: All right. The next one on the list...
engSearchText: All right. The next one on the list...
jpnChrName: さぁて、お次は……
jpnSearchText: さぁて、お次は……

engChrName: ...is you, Arioch.
engSearchText: ...is you, Arioch.
jpnChrName: 次は貴方の番よ、アリオッチ。
jpnSearchText: 次は貴方の番よ、アリオッチ。

engChrName: And what's a beautiful babe like you doin' here? How'd you manage to find me?
engSearchText:
And what's a beautiful babe like you doin' here?
How'd you manage to find me?
jpnChrName: 《剣の乙女》さんか。 よく俺を待ち伏せできたもんだな？
jpnSearchText:
《剣の乙女》さんか。
よく俺を待ち伏せできたもんだな？

engChrName: I just analyzed your habits: the frequency of your strikes, the manner in which you pick your targets, and the distance you travel when teleporting.
engSearchText:
I just analyzed your habits: the frequency of your
strikes, the manner in which you pick your targets,
and the distance you travel when teleporting.
jpnChrName: 貴方の襲撃頻度、ターゲットの傾向、 どの方角にどれだけの距離転位するか……
jpnSearchText:
貴方の襲撃頻度、ターゲットの傾向、
どの方角にどれだけの距離転位するか……

engChrName: With all that information at my disposal, predicting your movements was child's play.
engSearchText:
With all that information at my disposal, predicting
your movements was child's play.
jpnChrName: ある程度の情報があれば 行動を予測することは可能よ。
jpnSearchText:
ある程度の情報があれば
行動を予測することは可能よ。

engChrName: Hot damn, that's impressive. Oh, and speakin' of hot stuff, look at you! They don't call you Beauty's Blade for nothing.
engSearchText:
Hot damn, that's impressive. Oh, and speakin' of hot
stuff, look at you! They don't call you Beauty's Blade
for nothing.
jpnChrName: ハハ、そいつは大したもんだ。 その上噂通りの美人ときてる。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、そいつは大したもんだ。
その上噂通りの美人ときてる。

engChrName: You've got guts to spare, too. Comin' after me is a ballsy play—not to mention a stupid one.
engSearchText:
You've got guts to spare, too. Comin' after me is a
ballsy play—not to mention a stupid one.
jpnChrName: だが──この俺を直接狙うってのは 幾らなんでも度胸ありすぎねぇか……？
jpnSearchText:
だが──この俺を直接狙うってのは
幾らなんでも度胸ありすぎねぇか……？

engChrName: I do not make my decisions lightly. I've been lying in wait for you for some time.
engSearchText:
I do not make my decisions lightly. I've been lying in
wait for you for some time.
jpnChrName: ……冗談を言うために わざわざ待ち伏せするとでも？
jpnSearchText:
……冗談を言うために
わざわざ待ち伏せするとでも？

engChrName: Heh. Of all the gutsy women I've met, you take the cake—even if that actress is one tough cookie, too.
engSearchText:
Heh. Of all the gutsy women I've met, you take the
cake—even if that actress is one tough cookie, too.
jpnChrName: クク、あの女優もそうだが お前さんも大したタマみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、あの女優もそうだが
お前さんも大したタマみたいだな。

engChrName: You were talking with Melchior about somethin' yesterday, yeah? That why you're here?
engSearchText:
You were talking with Melchior about somethin'
yesterday, yeah? That why you're here?
jpnChrName: 察するにアレか？　昨日メルキオルと 何か話してたみたいだが。
jpnSearchText:
察するにアレか？　昨日メルキオルと
何か話してたみたいだが。

engChrName: I take it you were spying on us with the surveillance system?
engSearchText:
I take it you were spying on us with the
surveillance system?
jpnChrName: ……“監視システム”越しに 感づいていたみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
……“監視システム”越しに
感づいていたみたいね。

engChrName: Ideally, I would like to defeat you here...
engSearchText: Ideally, I would like to defeat you here...
jpnChrName: 結果的にこの場で貴方を倒せたら それに越したことはないけど……
jpnSearchText:
結果的にこの場で貴方を倒せたら
それに越したことはないけど……

engChrName: ...but that isn't my primary objective.
engSearchText: ...but that isn't my primary objective.
jpnChrName: それはあくまでついでよ。
jpnSearchText: それはあくまでついでよ。

engChrName: Got'cha. Well, you can take me on if you want. There's no rule against it.
engSearchText:
Got'cha. Well, you can take me on if you want.
There's no rule against it.
jpnChrName: ハハ、こっちとしては望むところだ。 それ自体は“ルール違反”でもねぇしな。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、こっちとしては望むところだ。
それ自体は“ルール違反”でもねぇしな。

engChrName: Bear in mind, though...
engSearchText: Bear in mind, though...
jpnChrName: ただし………
jpnSearchText: ただし………

engChrName: ...I'm not gonna go easy on ya just 'cause you're a chick.
engSearchText:
...I'm not gonna go easy on ya just 'cause you're
a chick.
jpnChrName: 女相手だからって手加減できるほど 器用なタイプじゃなくてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
女相手だからって手加減できるほど
器用なタイプじゃなくてねぇ。

engChrName: Try not to die on me too quickly, yeah?
engSearchText: Try not to die on me too quickly, yeah?
jpnChrName: せいぜい簡単にブッ壊れるんじゃねぇぞ？
jpnSearchText: せいぜい簡単にブッ壊れるんじゃねぇぞ？

engChrName: Same to you.
engSearchText: Same to you.
jpnChrName: 舐められたものね……！
jpnSearchText: 舐められたものね……！

engChrName: Oh, my.
engSearchText: Oh, my.
jpnChrName: おやおや、これは……
jpnSearchText: おやおや、これは……

engChrName: I sense a large group on the other side of this door. And...I think my brother is with them.
engSearchText:
I sense a large group on the other side of this door.
And...I think my brother is with them.
jpnChrName: 中から多数の気配を感じます！ それにまさか……
jpnSearchText:
中から多数の気配を感じます！
それにまさか……

engChrName: Wait! I sense a large group on the other side of this door.
engSearchText:
Wait! I sense a large group on the other side of
this door.
jpnChrName: 待ってください、 中から多数の気配を感じます！
jpnSearchText:
待ってください、
中から多数の気配を感じます！

engChrName: And...I think my brother is with them.
engSearchText: And...I think my brother is with them.
jpnChrName: それにまさか……
jpnSearchText: それにまさか……

engChrName: ...One of Marduk's top units lies beyond that door. They aren't even attempting to mask their presence.
engSearchText:
...One of Marduk's top units lies beyond that door.
They aren't even attempting to mask their presence.
jpnChrName: ……隠そうともしていませんね。 中にいるのはマルドゥック社の精鋭部隊です。
jpnSearchText:
……隠そうともしていませんね。
中にいるのはマルドゥック社の精鋭部隊です。

engChrName: I believe they are waiting for us.
engSearchText: I believe they are waiting for us.
jpnChrName: 恐らく、わたくしたちを待ち構えているかと。
jpnSearchText: 恐らく、わたくしたちを待ち構えているかと。

engChrName: Kasim's definitely there, then.
engSearchText: Kasim's definitely there, then.
jpnChrName: お兄ちゃん……
jpnSearchText: お兄ちゃん……

engChrName: If that is the case, then I would strongly advise against fighting them.
engSearchText:
If that is the case, then I would strongly advise against
fighting them.
jpnChrName: 一応進言しておきますが…… 交戦はあまりお勧めしません。
jpnSearchText:
一応進言しておきますが……
交戦はあまりお勧めしません。

engChrName: Oh, HELL no. We didn't come this far just to turn tail at the eleventh hour. I get they're your company and all, but—
engSearchText:
Oh, HELL no. We didn't come this far just to turn
tail at the eleventh hour. I get they're your company
and all, but—
jpnChrName: おい、今さら何言ってやがる？ いくら派遣元の同僚だからって──
jpnSearchText:
おい、今さら何言ってやがる？
いくら派遣元の同僚だからって──

engChrName: That's not what I mean.
engSearchText: That's not what I mean.
jpnChrName: そういう意味ではありません。 ただ単に……
jpnSearchText:
そういう意味ではありません。
ただ単に……

engChrName: Objectively speaking, our odds of defeating Kasim Al-Fayed are low. Dangerously so, even.
engSearchText:
Objectively speaking, our odds of defeating Kasim
Al-Fayed are low. Dangerously so, even.
jpnChrName: カシム・アルファイド主任相手では 勝算が限りなく低いからです。
jpnSearchText:
カシム・アルファイド主任相手では
勝算が限りなく低いからです。

engChrName: He's the strongest warrior alive—and maybe even who ever lived. People don't call him the Khamsin for nothin'.
engSearchText:
He's the strongest warrior alive—and maybe even
who ever lived. People don't call him the Khamsin
for nothin'.
jpnChrName: ああ、《灼飆（カムシン）》の異名を持つ 現役最強、いや史上最強クラスの兵士──
jpnSearchText:
ああ、《灼飆（カムシン）》の異名を持つ
現役最強、いや史上最強クラスの兵士──

engChrName: If we take him on, we'll get slaughtered. Plain and simple.
engSearchText:
If we take him on, we'll get slaughtered. Plain
and simple.
jpnChrName: まともにやり合っても勝ち目はねぇ。
jpnSearchText: まともにやり合っても勝ち目はねぇ。

engChrName: I-I would rather not, then.
engSearchText: I-I would rather not, then.
jpnChrName: そ、そこまで……？
jpnSearchText: そ、そこまで……？

engChrName: He might be stronger than most martial arts masters.
engSearchText: He might be stronger than most martial arts masters.
jpnChrName: 武術家で言えば達人級（マスタークラス）…… いや、それを超えた気当たりかもしれん。
jpnSearchText:
武術家で言えば達人級（マスタークラス）……
いや、それを超えた気当たりかもしれん。

engChrName: I have heard rumors of his exceptional strength, but I've never fought him myself.
engSearchText:
I have heard rumors of his exceptional strength, but
I've never fought him myself.
jpnChrName: ……噂は聞いておりますが 異質なほどの練度みたいですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
……噂は聞いておりますが
異質なほどの練度みたいですねぇ。

engChrName: Sounds like a challenge. Let's go for it.
engSearchText: Sounds like a challenge. Let's go for it.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そう言われると 尚更気になってしまうけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そう言われると
尚更気になってしまうけど。

engChrName: Heehee. I'm especially interested in him now since that rumor seems to have proved true.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I'm especially interested in him now since
that rumor seems to have proved true.
jpnChrName: うふふ、あの噂は 本当だったみたいやしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、あの噂は
本当だったみたいやしねぇ。

engChrName: Oh, the one about where he ended up? Heh. Yeah.
engSearchText: Oh, the one about where he ended up? Heh. Yeah.
jpnChrName: ああ、“あの場所”にまで 紛れ込まれたっつーアレか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、“あの場所”にまで
紛れ込まれたっつーアレか。

engChrName: Since we have you guys with us, I wouldn't say our odds of beating them are zero.
engSearchText:
Since we have you guys with us, I wouldn't say our
odds of beating them are zero.
jpnChrName: ま、今回はアンタらもいることだし、 “もしかしたら”はありそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
ま、今回はアンタらもいることだし、
“もしかしたら”はありそうだが……

engChrName: But even if we somehow came out on top, we'd be dead on our feet afterwards.
engSearchText:
But even if we somehow came out on top, we'd be
dead on our feet afterwards.
jpnChrName: 仮に勝ったとしても、 こっちの損害は馬鹿にならねぇだろう。
jpnSearchText:
仮に勝ったとしても、
こっちの損害は馬鹿にならねぇだろう。

engChrName: We cannot afford that risk, then. We still have to face the Almata boss.
engSearchText:
We cannot afford that risk, then. We still have to face
the Almata boss.
jpnChrName: 奥で待ち構えている“担当者”との 戦いを考えたら、それも避けたい所か。
jpnSearchText:
奥で待ち構えている“担当者”との
戦いを考えたら、それも避けたい所か。

engChrName: But that won't be possible unless we get his cards. What a conundrum.
engSearchText:
But that won't be possible unless we get his cards.
What a conundrum.
jpnChrName: ですが全ての アクセスキーを集めないと……
jpnSearchText:
ですが全ての
アクセスキーを集めないと……

engChrName: What's your job again, Judith?
engSearchText: What's your job again, Judith?
jpnChrName: ──ジュディス、 お前さんの仕事はなんだ？
jpnSearchText:
──ジュディス、
お前さんの仕事はなんだ？

engChrName: Huh? That was random. I'm an actress, which you should, uh, already know.
engSearchText:
Huh? That was random. I'm an actress, which you
should, uh, already know.
jpnChrName: ……急に何よ？ 女優に決まってるじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
……急に何よ？
女優に決まってるじゃない。

engChrName: No, not that. I mean your side gig.
engSearchText: No, not that. I mean your side gig.
jpnChrName: 違う、副業の方だ。
jpnSearchText: 違う、副業の方だ。

engChrName: You know, the one where you dress up like a scantily-clad cat burglar.
engSearchText:
You know, the one where you dress up like a
scantily-clad cat burglar.
jpnChrName: あと本業は痴女だろ？
jpnSearchText: あと本業は痴女だろ？

engChrName: Oh, shut up! It's not THAT revealing!
engSearchText: Oh, shut up! It's not THAT revealing!
jpnChrName: 誰が痴女よッ！
jpnSearchText: 誰が痴女よッ！

engChrName: Sweet Aidios. Have you never looked at yourself in the mirror?
engSearchText:
Sweet Aidios. Have you never looked at yourself in
the mirror?
jpnChrName: そうかもしれねえが 混ぜっ返すんじゃねーよ。
jpnSearchText:
そうかもしれねえが
混ぜっ返すんじゃねーよ。

engChrName: ...Do you want to get smacked again?
engSearchText: ...Do you want to get smacked again?
jpnChrName: そうかもしれないって何よ！？
jpnSearchText: そうかもしれないって何よ！？

engChrName: ...Getting back on topic, I think I understand where you're going with this.
engSearchText:
...Getting back on topic, I think I understand where
you're going with this.
jpnChrName: 話が進まないから。 ……つまりそういう事でしょ？
jpnSearchText:
話が進まないから。
……つまりそういう事でしょ？

engChrName: Well, someone clue me in because I don't. What does my job have to do with this?
engSearchText:
Well, someone clue me in because I don't. What does
my job have to do with this?
jpnChrName: ふう、それで── “副業”がどうしたっていうの？
jpnSearchText:
ふう、それで──
“副業”がどうしたっていうの？

engChrName: I've got a plan, and you're gonna be a part of it.
engSearchText: I've got a plan, and you're gonna be a part of it.
jpnChrName: 作戦がある。
jpnSearchText: 作戦がある。

engChrName: I have been waiting for you all.
engSearchText: I have been waiting for you all.
jpnChrName: 来たか、フェリーダ。 リゼット嬢にヴァンたちも。
jpnSearchText:
来たか、フェリーダ。
リゼット嬢にヴァンたちも。

engChrName: Kasim.
engSearchText: Kasim.
jpnChrName: お兄ちゃん……
jpnSearchText: お兄ちゃん……

engChrName: It is good to see you again, Mr. Al-Fayed.
engSearchText: It is good to see you again, Mr. Al-Fayed.
jpnChrName: 先日ぶりですね、カシム主任。
jpnSearchText: 先日ぶりですね、カシム主任。

engChrName: Guess we both made it to the last day. Can't say I'm surprised.
engSearchText:
Guess we both made it to the last day. Can't say
I'm surprised.
jpnChrName: お互い最後まで残ったか。 ま、ちっとも意外じゃねえが。
jpnSearchText:
お互い最後まで残ったか。
ま、ちっとも意外じゃねえが。

engChrName: I can, though. To be frank, I did not expect you to have come as far as you have.
engSearchText:
I can, though. To be frank, I did not expect you to
have come as far as you have.
jpnChrName: そちらの健闘ぶりは 少々予想外ではあるがな。
jpnSearchText:
そちらの健闘ぶりは
少々予想外ではあるがな。

engChrName: Though I'm afraid it's the end of the road for you.
engSearchText: Though I'm afraid it's the end of the road for you.
jpnChrName: だが、それもここまでだ。
jpnSearchText: だが、それもここまでだ。

engChrName: All units, prepare for battle. Assume formation C5.
engSearchText: All units, prepare for battle. Assume formation C5.
jpnChrName: 総員、第二種戦闘準備、 Ｃ３からＣ５にシフト。
jpnSearchText:
総員、第二種戦闘準備、
Ｃ３からＣ５にシフト。

engChrName: Our target is Team Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText: Our target is Team Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: 目標──アークライド解決事務所。
jpnSearchText: 目標──アークライド解決事務所。

engChrName: Guess we're gettin' right into it, then.
engSearchText: Guess we're gettin' right into it, then.
jpnChrName: 来るぞ！　全力で応戦しろ！
jpnSearchText: 来るぞ！　全力で応戦しろ！

engChrName: (Guh! This guy's insane! I can't keep this up for long!)
engSearchText:
(Guh! This guy's insane! I can't keep this up
for long!)
jpnChrName: （クッ、容赦ねえな……！   長くは持たねえぞ！）
jpnSearchText:
（クッ、容赦ねえな……！
長くは持たねえぞ！）

engChrName: (But I ain't givin' up—not while I have a breath in me!)
engSearchText:
(But I ain't givin' up—not while I have a breath
in me!)
jpnChrName: （だがまだだ──何とかこのまま……！）
jpnSearchText: （だがまだだ──何とかこのまま……！）

engChrName: To be honest, I'm a little surprised to see Marduk going all in on this.
engSearchText:
To be honest, I'm a little surprised to see Marduk
going all in on this.
jpnChrName: マルドゥックも随分と今回の件に 力を入れてるみたいだな……！？
jpnSearchText:
マルドゥックも随分と今回の件に
力を入れてるみたいだな……！？

engChrName: They're really bettin' the ranch by sending you here.
engSearchText: They're really bettin' the ranch by sending you here.
jpnChrName: なにせ最強のエースを寄越すくらいだ！
jpnSearchText: なにせ最強のエースを寄越すくらいだ！

engChrName: After Almata showed their hand, I'd have thought you guys would play it safe—or at least hold your best playing cards closer to the chest.
engSearchText:
After Almata showed their hand, I'd have thought
you guys would play it safe—or at least hold your
best playing cards closer to the chest.
jpnChrName: 反応兵器のリスク──実際にそうなったが、 普通なら様子見でもおかしくねえだろうに！
jpnSearchText:
反応兵器のリスク──実際にそうなったが、
普通なら様子見でもおかしくねえだろうに！

engChrName: I am not at liberty to discuss corporate decisions.
engSearchText: I am not at liberty to discuss corporate decisions.
jpnChrName: 社の方針だ──返答しかねる。
jpnSearchText: 社の方針だ──返答しかねる。

engChrName: I complete the assignments I am given. Nothing more.
engSearchText:
I complete the assignments I am given.
Nothing more.
jpnChrName: 依頼として受けた以上、達成するだけだ。
jpnSearchText: 依頼として受けた以上、達成するだけだ。

engChrName: And I'll bet this one came straight from the president's office. I know you guys are pretty tight-knit.
engSearchText:
And I'll bet this one came straight from the
president's office. I know you guys are
pretty tight-knit.
jpnChrName: 前回同様、大統領府なんだろう！？ また随分と仲がいいじゃねえか……！
jpnSearchText:
前回同様、大統領府なんだろう！？
また随分と仲がいいじゃねえか……！

engChrName: I'm real curious about that. When did Marduk get into bed with 'em?
engSearchText:
I'm real curious about that. When did Marduk get
into bed with 'em?
jpnChrName: それで── どのくらい前からお得意様なんだ？
jpnSearchText:
それで──
どのくらい前からお得意様なんだ？

engChrName: That information is classified as well.
engSearchText: That information is classified as well.
jpnChrName: それも同様に社外秘だ。
jpnSearchText: それも同様に社外秘だ。

engChrName: You sure like to run your mouth, don't you, Arkride? Almost as if you are trying to stall.
engSearchText:
You sure like to run your mouth, don't you, Arkride?
Almost as if you are trying to stall.
jpnChrName: それと……戦闘中でも舌が回るのは 君の大きな武器だが。
jpnSearchText:
それと……戦闘中でも舌が回るのは
君の大きな武器だが。

engChrName: Ugh!
engSearchText: Ugh!
jpnSearchText: ぐッ……！！

engChrName: I'm afraid your little tricks will not work on me!
engSearchText: I'm afraid your little tricks will not work on me!
jpnChrName: ──格上相手には 通じないと教えたはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
──格上相手には
通じないと教えたはずだ。

engChrName: Gah... Now!
engSearchText: Gah... Now!
jpnChrName: ──ここだ！！
jpnSearchText: ──ここだ！！

engChrName: Haaaaah!
engSearchText: Haaaaah!
jpnChrName: はああっ！
jpnSearchText: はああっ！

engChrName: ...Pathetic!
engSearchText: ...Pathetic!
jpnChrName: ッ──甘い！！
jpnSearchText: ッ──甘い！！

engChrName: H-He blocked my attack? But that was his blind spot, I'm sure!
engSearchText:
H-He blocked my attack? But that was his blind spot,
I'm sure!
jpnChrName: ふ、防がれた……！？ 完全に死角を突いたのに！
jpnSearchText:
ふ、防がれた……！？
完全に死角を突いたのに！

engChrName: As I said, I am wise to such tricks—and I was well aware that you were with them, Grimcat.
engSearchText:
As I said, I am wise to such tricks—and I was well
aware that you were with them, Grimcat.
jpnChrName: 怪盗グリムキャッツか……彼らと 行動を共にしていることは把握済みだ。
jpnSearchText:
怪盗グリムキャッツか……彼らと
行動を共にしていることは把握済みだ。

engChrName: That is why I was suspicious when you were not among them. I anticipated foul play.
engSearchText:
That is why I was suspicious when you were not
among them. I anticipated foul play.
jpnChrName: その上姿が見えないとなると、 警戒するのは当然だろう。
jpnSearchText:
その上姿が見えないとなると、
警戒するのは当然だろう。

engChrName: Darn. You saw through our elaborate ruse. Guess this plan was a dud...
engSearchText:
Darn. You saw through our elaborate ruse. Guess this
plan was a dud...
jpnChrName: そう、“彼女”の不在を そんなに気にしてくれるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
そう、“彼女”の不在を
そんなに気にしてくれるなんて……

engChrName: ...Psych!
engSearchText: ...Psych!
jpnChrName: ──ありがとねっ！！
jpnSearchText: ──ありがとねっ！！

engChrName: Futile—
engSearchText: Futile—
jpnChrName: 無駄だ──っ！？
jpnSearchText: 無駄だ──っ！？

engChrName: Took the bait. Hook, line, and sinker!
engSearchText: Took the bait. Hook, line, and sinker!
jpnChrName: アクセスキー５つ、ゲットです！
jpnSearchText: アクセスキー５つ、ゲットです！

engChrName: Ferida?! Then Grimcat was the decoy?!
engSearchText: Ferida?! Then Grimcat was the decoy?!
jpnChrName: フェリーダ！？ 怪盗の方が囮か──！
jpnSearchText:
フェリーダ！？
怪盗の方が囮か──！

engChrName: Ha! Fell for it! We're done here, gang. Time to bail!
engSearchText: Ha! Fell for it! We're done here, gang. Time to bail!
jpnChrName: そういうこった！ ──目標達成、撤収するぞ！
jpnSearchText:
そういうこった！
──目標達成、撤収するぞ！

engChrName: If you think we will let you get—
engSearchText: If you think we will let you get—
jpnChrName: まさか逃げられるとでも──
jpnSearchText: まさか逃げられるとでも──

engChrName: You wanna chase after 'em? Then you'll just have to get through us.
engSearchText:
You wanna chase after 'em? Then you'll just have to
get through us.
jpnChrName: おっと、少しばかり 俺たちの相手をしてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
おっと、少しばかり
俺たちの相手をしてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Sylphid and the Immovable...
engSearchText: Sylphid and the Immovable...
jpnChrName: 《不動》に《西風》の……
jpnSearchText: 《不動》に《西風》の……

engChrName: We won't let you get in their way.
engSearchText: We won't let you get in their way.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちの邪魔はさせない。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンたちの邪魔はさせない。

engChrName: Not an option.
engSearchText: Not an option.
jpnChrName: 行かせません……！
jpnSearchText: 行かせません……！

engChrName: Yin and the White Orchid Dragon...
engSearchText: Yin and the White Orchid Dragon...
jpnChrName: 《銀》に《白蘭竜》……
jpnSearchText: 《銀》に《白蘭竜》……

engChrName: I'm not sure how I will fare against you, but I suppose we shall find out soon enough.
engSearchText:
I'm not sure how I will fare against you, but I suppose
we shall find out soon enough.
jpnChrName: 少々荷が重そうですが、 足止めさせていただきましょう。
jpnSearchText:
少々荷が重そうですが、
足止めさせていただきましょう。

engChrName: You shall not pass.
engSearchText: You shall not pass.
jpnChrName: ──ここは通さぬ。
jpnSearchText: ──ここは通さぬ。

engChrName: Ikaruga...
engSearchText: Ikaruga...
jpnSearchText: 《斑鳩》……

engChrName: We might have the same client right now, but I juuust can't pass up this opportunity to go toe-to-toe with you.
engSearchText:
We might have the same client right now, but I
juuust can't pass up this opportunity to go toe-to-toe
with you.
jpnChrName: 契約先は同じだけど──貴方とは一度、 手合わせ願いたいと思っていた。
jpnSearchText:
契約先は同じだけど──貴方とは一度、
手合わせ願いたいと思っていた。

engChrName: So what do you say? Wanna go at it for a while?
engSearchText: So what do you say? Wanna go at it for a while?
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、早速始めようか？
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ、早速始めようか？

engChrName: You've danced with them for quite a while. How about you switch partners with us?
engSearchText:
You've danced with them for quite a while.
How about you switch partners with us?
jpnChrName: 悪いけど、すこぉしばかり ウチらの相手してもらえへん？
jpnSearchText:
悪いけど、すこぉしばかり
ウチらの相手してもらえへん？

engChrName: Ouroboros...
engSearchText: Ouroboros...
jpnChrName: 《身喰らう蛇》……
jpnSearchText: 《身喰らう蛇》……

engChrName: Remember that stunt you pulled a year and a half ago? I sure do. The professor totally lost his shit over it.
engSearchText:
Remember that stunt you pulled a year and a
half ago? I sure do. The professor totally lost his shit
over it.
jpnChrName: そういや１年半前のアレは 博士が狼狽えまくってたぜ？
jpnSearchText:
そういや１年半前のアレは
博士が狼狽えまくってたぜ？

engChrName: I got a good laugh outta that one. By the way, he told me to say hi if I ever ran into you. And he ordered me to give you a good thrashing, too.
engSearchText:
I got a good laugh outta that one. By the way, he told
me to say hi if I ever ran into you. And he ordered me
to give you a good thrashing, too.
jpnChrName: 正直ザマァねぇが、もし会えたら 挨拶しとけって頼まれててなァ。
jpnSearchText:
正直ザマァねぇが、もし会えたら
挨拶しとけって頼まれててなァ。

engChrName: Whew... Glad we pulled that one off.
engSearchText: Whew... Glad we pulled that one off.
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… とりあえず作戦は成功か。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
とりあえず作戦は成功か。

engChrName: My heart won't stop pounding... I hope those two will manage fine without us.
engSearchText:
My heart won't stop pounding... I hope those two will
manage fine without us.
jpnChrName: う、上手く行きましたね。 でもあのお二人は……
jpnSearchText:
う、上手く行きましたね。
でもあのお二人は……

engChrName: They can handle themselves. I'm certain they will find an opening to escape eventually.
engSearchText:
They can handle themselves. I'm certain they will find
an opening to escape eventually.
jpnChrName: どちらも相当なる手練れ── 頃合いを見て離脱し、追いつくだろう。
jpnSearchText:
どちらも相当なる手練れ──
頃合いを見て離脱し、追いつくだろう。

engChrName: You were the real MVP out there, small fry. It was a treat seeing the 'world's strongest warrior' look like he just got caught shitting the bed.
engSearchText:
You were the real MVP out there, small fry. It was a
treat seeing the 'world's strongest warrior' look like he
just got caught shitting the bed.
jpnChrName: クク、しかし“最強”の驚いた顔…… チビも中々やるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
クク、しかし“最強”の驚いた顔……
チビも中々やるじゃねえか。

engChrName: For real, though. You did really well.
engSearchText: For real, though. You did really well.
jpnChrName: うんうん、いい手際だったわ。
jpnSearchText: うんうん、いい手際だったわ。

engChrName: Heehee. It was a piece of cake!
engSearchText: Heehee. It was a piece of cake!
jpnChrName: えへへ…… ヴァンさんの作戦勝ちですよ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……
ヴァンさんの作戦勝ちですよ。

engChrName: Kasim always keeps his keys and other important stuff in the same place. It's a habit of his.
engSearchText:
Kasim always keeps his keys and other important stuff
in the same place. It's a habit of his.
jpnChrName: ……それと、お兄ちゃんが鍵とか入れる 場所のクセが変わってなくて良かったです。
jpnSearchText:
……それと、お兄ちゃんが鍵とか入れる
場所のクセが変わってなくて良かったです。

engChrName: Old habits die hard, I suppose.
engSearchText: Old habits die hard, I suppose.
jpnChrName: はは……そうだったんだ。
jpnSearchText: はは……そうだったんだ。

engChrName: And we are more than happy to take advantage of it.
engSearchText: And we are more than happy to take advantage of it.
jpnChrName: 良かったですね、フェリちゃん。
jpnSearchText: 良かったですね、フェリちゃん。

engChrName: Yep. Good work, Feri.
engSearchText: Yep. Good work, Feri.
jpnChrName: お手柄として── ここで長話はできねえな。
jpnSearchText:
お手柄として──
ここで長話はできねえな。

engChrName: Okay, time to get moving. Sucks that we have to leave those two behind, but we gotta press on.
engSearchText:
Okay, time to get moving. Sucks that we have to
leave those two behind, but we gotta press on.
jpnChrName: あの２人抜きにはなるが、 とにかく先に進むぞ。
jpnSearchText:
あの２人抜きにはなるが、
とにかく先に進むぞ。

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はいっ！
jpnSearchText: はいっ！

engChrName: Stop right there.
engSearchText: Stop right there.
jpnChrName: ──待ちなさい。
jpnSearchText: ──待ちなさい。

engChrName: Elaine...
engSearchText: Elaine...
jpnChrName: エレイン……
jpnSearchText: エレイン……

engChrName: Wh-What?!
engSearchText: Wh-What?!
jpnChrName: エ、エレインさん！？
jpnSearchText: エ、エレインさん！？

engChrName: There you are! Where've you been all this time? Fie and Zin are worried sick!
engSearchText:
There you are! Where've you been all this time?
Fie and Zin are worried sick!
jpnChrName: こんな所に…… フィーさんたちが捜していました！
jpnSearchText:
こんな所に……
フィーさんたちが捜していました！

engChrName: W-Wait. What are you doing here?
engSearchText: W-Wait. What are you doing here?
jpnChrName: で、でもどうしてここに……
jpnSearchText: で、でもどうしてここに……

engChrName: ...I see now. Looks like the mystery of the twentieth team has been solved.
engSearchText:
...I see now. Looks like the mystery of the twentieth
team has been solved.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど、そういう事か。 昨日増えた２０番目のチームって……
jpnSearchText:
……なるほど、そういう事か。
昨日増えた２０番目のチームって……

engChrName: There's no way.
engSearchText: There's no way.
jpnChrName: オイオイ、まさか……
jpnSearchText: オイオイ、まさか……

engChrName: We're looking for someone who knew we paired up with another team, right?
engSearchText:
We're looking for someone who knew we paired up
with another team, right?
jpnChrName: ……初日の時点であたしたちと協力者が 手を結んでたのを知ってた存在、だったっけ。
jpnSearchText:
……初日の時点であたしたちと協力者が
手を結んでたのを知ってた存在、だったっけ。

engChrName: Ms. Bright would fit that description, but she is currently on the surface.
engSearchText:
Ms. Bright would fit that description, but she is
currently on the surface.
jpnChrName: なるほど──レン様も条件に合いますが “中継役”として地下には入ってない様子。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど──レン様も条件に合いますが
“中継役”として地下には入ってない様子。

engChrName: Which leaves only one other possible candidate.
engSearchText: Which leaves only one other possible candidate.
jpnChrName: そうなると唯一合致するのが……
jpnSearchText: そうなると唯一合致するのが……

engChrName: And that's you, isn't it, Elaine?
engSearchText: And that's you, isn't it, Elaine?
jpnChrName: ──エレインさんだったんですね、 新たな２０番目の参加者は。
jpnSearchText:
──エレインさんだったんですね、
新たな２０番目の参加者は。

engChrName: You found me out. Well done.
engSearchText: You found me out. Well done.
jpnChrName: ええ、その通りよ。 だから──
jpnSearchText:
ええ、その通りよ。
だから──

engChrName: Now, then. I will ask that you hand over your cards— or I shall take them by force.
engSearchText:
Now, then. I will ask that you hand over your cards—
or I shall take them by force.
jpnChrName: 勝負よ、アークライド解決事務所。
jpnSearchText: 勝負よ、アークライド解決事務所。

engChrName: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Hang on a second!
engSearchText: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Hang on a second!
jpnChrName: えと、待ってください……！
jpnSearchText: えと、待ってください……！

engChrName: Wh-Why? I don't think we have to fight—
engSearchText: Wh-Why? I don't think we have to fight—
jpnChrName: ど、どうして僕たちが 貴女と戦わなくちゃ──
jpnSearchText:
ど、どうして僕たちが
貴女と戦わなくちゃ──

engChrName: I beg to differ. You have no choice but to face me.
engSearchText: I beg to differ. You have no choice but to face me.
jpnChrName: 知れたこと── ゲームを進めるためでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
知れたこと──
ゲームを進めるためでしょう？

engChrName: After all, I have a number of keycards in my possession.
engSearchText:
After all, I have a number of keycards in
my possession.
jpnChrName: ちなみに私は今、 アクセスキーを数個持っている。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに私は今、
アクセスキーを数個持っている。

engChrName: Guess there's no way around it, then.
engSearchText: Guess there's no way around it, then.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど。 既に覚悟完了みてぇだな。
jpnSearchText:
……なるほど。
既に覚悟完了みてぇだな。

engChrName: So it seems. She is laying all her cards on the table— literally and figuratively.
engSearchText:
So it seems. She is laying all her cards on the table—
literally and figuratively.
jpnChrName: うむ……全てを賭けて 我ら全員に挑むつもりに相違あるまい。
jpnSearchText:
うむ……全てを賭けて
我ら全員に挑むつもりに相違あるまい。

engChrName: That's right. I am prepared to stake everything on this battle—even my title and my rank, if I must.
engSearchText:
That's right. I am prepared to stake everything on this
battle—even my title and my rank, if I must.
jpnChrName: ええ──《剣の乙女》の渾名と Ａ級としての肩書を賭けてでも。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──《剣の乙女》の渾名と
Ａ級としての肩書を賭けてでも。

engChrName: Stay back, you guys. I'm gonna handle this one myself.
engSearchText:
Stay back, you guys. I'm gonna handle this
one myself.
jpnChrName: 下がってろ、俺一人でやる。
jpnSearchText: 下がってろ、俺一人でやる。

engChrName: I'm gonna bet all my cards on this. If you beat me, they're yours.
engSearchText:
I'm gonna bet all my cards on this. If you beat me,
they're yours.
jpnChrName: ──お互いが持ってる 全てのアクセスキーを賭けてな。
jpnSearchText:
──お互いが持ってる
全てのアクセスキーを賭けてな。

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……！？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……！？

engChrName: ...Have you lost your mind?
engSearchText: ...Have you lost your mind?
jpnChrName: ……どういうつもりかしら、 ヴァン・アークライド。
jpnSearchText:
……どういうつもりかしら、
ヴァン・アークライド。

engChrName: If you believe a simple handyman like you can best a bracer of my caliber, then you've truly gone off the deep end.
engSearchText:
If you believe a simple handyman like you can best a
bracer of my caliber, then you've truly gone off the
deep end.
jpnChrName: たかが裏の便利屋ごときが《剣の乙女》を 見くびっているわけじゃないわよね？
jpnSearchText:
たかが裏の便利屋ごときが《剣の乙女》を
見くびっているわけじゃないわよね？
