Your body is artificial. It was built without the
inconveniences that come with flesh and blood.
jpnChrName: その身体──とても合理的で 生物的な煩わしさとも無縁の“器”。
jpnSearchText:
その身体──とても合理的で
生物的な煩わしさとも無縁の“器”。

engChrName: That is why I almost envy you. I wish I was blessed with a vessel as ideal as yours.
engSearchText:
That is why I almost envy you. I wish I was blessed
with a vessel as ideal as yours.
jpnChrName: 理想的で“羨ましく”すら思えます。
jpnSearchText: 理想的で“羨ましく”すら思えます。
っ……

engChrName: You're...jealous?
engSearchText: You're...jealous?
jpnChrName: ……アンタは………
jpnSearchText: ……アンタは………

engChrName: I am satisfied—no, I am grateful for the body I possess.
engSearchText:
I am satisfied—no, I am grateful for the body
I possess.
jpnChrName: ……この身体に不満はありません。
jpnSearchText: ……この身体に不満はありません。

engChrName: However, I advise that you learn to appreciate yours as well. Do not take it for granted.
engSearchText:
However, I advise that you learn to appreciate yours
as well. Do not take it for granted.
jpnChrName: ですが、貴女が生身だとするなら どうかご自身の身体を大切にしてください。
jpnSearchText:
ですが、貴女が生身だとするなら
どうかご自身の身体を大切にしてください。

engChrName: My body is, like you said, artificial—as are my sensors, which were designed to merely replicate the five senses of the human body.
engSearchText:
My body is, like you said, artificial—as are my
sensors, which were designed to merely replicate the
five senses of the human body.
jpnChrName: 視覚も、聴覚も触覚も、味覚も嗅覚も、 わたくしが得られるものは再現されたもの……
jpnSearchText:
視覚も、聴覚も触覚も、味覚も嗅覚も、
わたくしが得られるものは再現されたもの……

engChrName: Those senses—the ones that all humans are born with—are precious. They are what make people whole.
engSearchText:
Those senses—the ones that all humans are born
with—are precious. They are what make
people whole.
jpnChrName: そしてそれらは、人の心や実存にとって 無くてはならない大切なものでもあって──
jpnSearchText:
そしてそれらは、人の心や実存にとって
無くてはならない大切なものでもあって──

engChrName: Trust me when I say you don't want to lose them. And if you do, you can never get them back.
engSearchText:
Trust me when I say you don't want to lose them.
And if you do, you can never get them back.
jpnChrName: ……“本物”を喪ってしまっては 二度と取り返しが付かないのですから。
jpnSearchText:
……“本物”を喪ってしまっては
二度と取り返しが付かないのですから。

engChrName: Risette...
engSearchText: Risette...
jpnChrName: リゼットさん……
jpnSearchText: リゼットさん……

engChrName: ...I fail to comprehend your logic.
engSearchText: ...I fail to comprehend your logic.
jpnChrName: ……やはり、理解できません。
jpnSearchText: ……やはり、理解できません。

engChrName: Human beings are just biological machines. Our consciousness is akin to a system that is operated by our brains.
engSearchText:
Human beings are just biological machines.
Our consciousness is akin to a system that is operated
by our brains.
jpnChrName: 人も生物的な機械──心も脳が 生み出した意識システムに過ぎない筈。
jpnSearchText:
人も生物的な機械──心も脳が
生み出した意識システムに過ぎない筈。

engChrName: We are all the same at our core. That includes you, me, and Ishtanti.
engSearchText:
We are all the same at our core. That includes you,
me, and Ishtanti.
jpnChrName: 本質的には同じでしょう。 貴方がたも、私も、《イシュタンティ》も。
jpnSearchText:
本質的には同じでしょう。
貴方がたも、私も、《イシュタンティ》も。

engChrName: We might as well be arguing with a brick wall.
engSearchText: We might as well be arguing with a brick wall.
jpnChrName: ……駄目だな、 いくら話してもムダだろう。
jpnSearchText:
……駄目だな、
いくら話してもムダだろう。

engChrName: How pitiful. I cannot help but wonder how she came to be this way—and where that doll of hers came from.
engSearchText:
How pitiful. I cannot help but wonder how she came
to be this way—and where that doll of hers
came from.
jpnChrName: なんと哀れな──その人形も含めて いかなる生い立ちか気にはなるが……
jpnSearchText:
なんと哀れな──その人形も含めて
いかなる生い立ちか気にはなるが……

engChrName: It is time to cut this trivial conversation short.
engSearchText: It is time to cut this trivial conversation short.
jpnChrName: そろそろいいでしょう── 十分、話には付き合ったはずです。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろいいでしょう──
十分、話には付き合ったはずです。

engChrName: Let us do battle. I, Olympia—overseer of the Garden of Aurum—shall serve as your opponent.
engSearchText:
Let us do battle. I, Olympia—overseer of the Garden
of Aurum—shall serve as your opponent.
jpnChrName: それでは“第三戦”を始めましょう。 《黄金の園（アウルムガーデン）》の管理人オランピアが相手です。
jpnSearchText:
それでは“第三戦”を始めましょう。
《黄金の園（アウルムガーデン）》の管理人オランピアが相手です。

engChrName: Time to turn up the heat, you guys, 'cause this stone-cold lady needs a little defrosting.
engSearchText:
Time to turn up the heat, you guys, 'cause this
stone-cold lady needs a little defrosting.
jpnChrName: いいぜ──ゲームのついでに まずは一つ、お前さんに教えてやる。
jpnSearchText:
いいぜ──ゲームのついでに
まずは一つ、お前さんに教えてやる。

engChrName: We're gonna get you all hot under the collar. Get ready to feel the bitter sting of defeat!
engSearchText:
We're gonna get you all hot under the collar.
Get ready to feel the bitter sting of defeat!
jpnChrName: 今の自分じゃ届かない結果…… “敗北”ってヤツの悔しさをな！
jpnSearchText:
今の自分じゃ届かない結果……
“敗北”ってヤツの悔しさをな！

engChrName: This...can't be happening.
engSearchText: This...can't be happening.
jpnSearchText: そん……な………

engChrName: I am incapable of losing...and so is Ishtanti. So why...?
engSearchText:
I am incapable of losing...and so is Ishtanti. So
why...?
jpnChrName: 私が……イシュタンティが…… 負けるはずが…………
jpnSearchText:
私が……イシュタンティが……
負けるはずが…………

engChrName: Aaah... AAAAAH!
engSearchText: Aaah... AAAAAH!
jpnChrName: ああぁ……ぁぁあああああ！！
jpnSearchText: ああぁ……ぁぁあああああ！！
っ……！？

engChrName: Something's not right here!
engSearchText: Something's not right here!
jpnChrName: 様子がおかしい……！？
jpnSearchText: 様子がおかしい……！？

engChrName: Aaaaaah!
engSearchText: Aaaaaah!
jpnChrName: ああああああぁぁぁ………
jpnSearchText: ああああああぁぁぁ………
…………………………………………

engChrName: Okay, first she starts screaming like a raving lunatic, and now she's gone mute?
engSearchText:
Okay, first she starts screaming like a raving lunatic,
and now she's gone mute?
jpnChrName: 今度はだんまりかよ！？
jpnSearchText: 今度はだんまりかよ！？

engChrName: Wh-What's going on here?
engSearchText: Wh-What's going on here?
jpnChrName: い、一体どうなって……？
jpnSearchText: い、一体どうなって……？

engChrName: Ah... So this is...who I am.
engSearchText: Ah... So this is...who I am.
jpnChrName: ……これは……私は………
jpnSearchText: ……これは……私は………

engChrName: No... NO! I know nothing of this!
engSearchText: No... NO! I know nothing of this!
jpnChrName: 違う…………違う！ こんなの知りません……！
jpnSearchText:
違う…………違う！
こんなの知りません……！

engChrName: It's all a lie! This isn't me! This CAN'T be me!
engSearchText: It's all a lie! This isn't me! This CAN'T be me!
jpnChrName: 知らない知らない知らない！！ きっとウソッ！！
jpnSearchText:
知らない知らない知らない！！
きっとウソッ！！

engChrName: It hurts... It hurts so much! I can't take it anymore! Make it stop!
engSearchText:
It hurts... It hurts so much! I can't take it anymore!
Make it stop!
jpnChrName: 苦しい……！　痛い……！　寒い……！ 熱い……！　もうイヤ……！
jpnSearchText:
苦しい……！　痛い……！　寒い……！
熱い……！　もうイヤ……！

engChrName: I want to punch, I want to kick, I want to run, I want to fly, I want to crush, I want to touch, I want to scream!
engSearchText:
I want to punch, I want to kick, I want to run, I want
to fly, I want to crush, I want to touch, I want
to scream!
jpnChrName: ぶつけたい殴りたい走りたい飛ばしたい 潰したい握りたい叫びたい──
jpnSearchText:
ぶつけたい殴りたい走りたい飛ばしたい
潰したい握りたい叫びたい──

engChrName: But I don't want to move—or talk or think or listen! I don't want to do any of that! I don't want this at all!
engSearchText:
But I don't want to move—or talk or think or listen!
I don't want to do any of that! I don't want this at all!
jpnChrName: でも行きたくない動きたくない喋りたくない 考えたくない聞きたくない──
jpnSearchText:
でも行きたくない動きたくない喋りたくない
考えたくない聞きたくない──

engChrName: AAAAAAAHH!
engSearchText: AAAAAAAHH!
jpnChrName: ぁぁぁぁぁあああああああああああ──！！
jpnSearchText: ぁぁぁぁぁあああああああああああ──！！

engChrName: Sh-She's not making any sense at all.
engSearchText: Sh-She's not making any sense at all.
jpnChrName: し、支離滅裂じゃない……！
jpnSearchText: し、支離滅裂じゃない……！

engChrName: No... Sh-She couldn't have...!
engSearchText: No... Sh-She couldn't have...!
jpnChrName: ま、まさか彼女は……！？
jpnSearchText: ま、まさか彼女は……！？

engChrName: She's gotten back all the emotions she was missing— and they're all hitting her like a whirlwind.
engSearchText:
She's gotten back all the emotions she was missing—
and they're all hitting her like a whirlwind.
jpnChrName: 感情を──獲得してるのか！？ しかも一気に……！
jpnSearchText:
感情を──獲得してるのか！？
しかも一気に……！

engChrName: That would explain her breakdown. But why now?
engSearchText: That would explain her breakdown. But why now?
jpnChrName: た、確かに…… でもどうしてそんな……！？
jpnSearchText:
た、確かに……
でもどうしてそんな……！？

engChrName: My guess is that doll-shaped artifact has something to do with it.
engSearchText:
My guess is that doll-shaped artifact has something to
do with it.
jpnChrName: ……恐らく、あの人形型の古代遺物と 関係していると見るべきだろう……！
jpnSearchText:
……恐らく、あの人形型の古代遺物と
関係していると見るべきだろう……！

engChrName: It's not that she never had emotions.
engSearchText: It's not that she never had emotions.
jpnChrName: 彼女は感情を持たないわけではなかった。
jpnSearchText: 彼女は感情を持たないわけではなかった。

engChrName: They were just being absorbed by the doll.
engSearchText: They were just being absorbed by the doll.
jpnChrName: ただ何らかの形で、全ての感情が あの人形に“吸い取られていた”のだ……！
jpnSearchText:
ただ何らかの形で、全ての感情が
あの人形に“吸い取られていた”のだ……！

engChrName: After sustaining enough damage, its ability to contain her emotions was compromised.
engSearchText:
After sustaining enough damage, its ability to contain
her emotions was compromised.
jpnChrName: そして、先ほどの戦闘による破損で、 その人形の機能が働かなくなり──
jpnSearchText:
そして、先ほどの戦闘による破損で、
その人形の機能が働かなくなり──

engChrName: And now they're all flooding back into her at once.
engSearchText: And now they're all flooding back into her at once.
jpnChrName: 一気に感情が解放されたのかもしれぬ！
jpnSearchText: 一気に感情が解放されたのかもしれぬ！

engChrName: Huh? Emotions? You're saying that I had them all along? Really?
engSearchText:
Huh? Emotions? You're saying that I had them
all along? Really?
jpnChrName: ぅ………感情？ 私にも……こんな……こんな……
jpnSearchText:
ぅ………感情？
私にも……こんな……こんな……

engChrName: So what am I feeling now? Is it...frustration? And sadness? All because I lost...? Wait. I...lost? But defeat means...
engSearchText:
So what am I feeling now? Is it...frustration?
And sadness? All because I lost...? Wait. I...lost?
But defeat means...
jpnChrName: 負けて……私……悔しい？　悲しい？ 私……負け……それは……それは……
jpnSearchText:
負けて……私……悔しい？　悲しい？
私……負け……それは……それは……

engChrName: ...death. Such is the fate for those who lose. Losers are not permitted to live. Which means I am not permitted to live. So I must die... No! NO!
engSearchText:
...death. Such is the fate for those who lose.
Losers are not permitted to live. Which means I am
not permitted to live. So I must die... No! NO!
jpnChrName: 負けは……死……負けて……死ぬ…… 私……負け……死……死……いゃ、いやだ！
jpnSearchText:
負けは……死……負けて……死ぬ……
私……負け……死……死……いゃ、いやだ！

engChrName: I'm scared!
engSearchText: I'm scared!
jpnChrName: 怖い！！！
jpnSearchText: 怖い！！！

engChrName: No, no, no! I'm scared! I'm scared! I'm scared! I don't want to die! I don't want to die! I don't want to die!
engSearchText:
No, no, no! I'm scared! I'm scared! I'm scared! I don't
want to die! I don't want to die! I don't want to die!
jpnChrName: 嫌だ嫌だ嫌だ！！　怖い怖い怖い！！ 死にたくない死にたくない死にたくない！！
jpnSearchText:
嫌だ嫌だ嫌だ！！　怖い怖い怖い！！
死にたくない死にたくない死にたくない！！

engChrName: But I've done so many horrible things...and I've killed so many people. How can I possibly live with myself?!
engSearchText:
But I've done so many horrible things...and I've killed
so many people. How can I possibly live with myself?!
jpnChrName: でも私……もういっぱい、殺してる？ こんな恐ろしいことを……いっぱい……
jpnSearchText:
でも私……もういっぱい、殺してる？
こんな恐ろしいことを……いっぱい……

engChrName: *whimper* Aaaaaaaaahh!
engSearchText: *whimper* Aaaaaaaaahh!
jpnChrName: ぁぁ……ぁぁぁぁあああああああ────
jpnSearchText: ぁぁ……ぁぁぁぁあああああああ────

engChrName: She never had to come to grips with all that guilt before—and now that guilt's gonna crush her from the inside out!
engSearchText:
She never had to come to grips with all that guilt
before—and now that guilt's gonna crush her from
the inside out!
jpnChrName: これまで抑えられてきた感情が 一気に流れ込んできてやがるのか……！
jpnSearchText:
これまで抑えられてきた感情が
一気に流れ込んできてやがるのか……！

engChrName: No... We have to do something!
engSearchText: No... We have to do something!
jpnChrName: こ、このままじゃ彼女は……！
jpnSearchText: こ、このままじゃ彼女は……！

engChrName: I didn't ask for this... I can't handle this pain! It's... It's too much to bear...
engSearchText:
I didn't ask for this... I can't handle this pain! It's...
It's too much to bear...
jpnChrName: こんなの………知りたくなかった！ ……もう……耐えられない…………
jpnSearchText:
こんなの………知りたくなかった！
……もう……耐えられない…………

engChrName: I...want to disappear.
engSearchText: I...want to disappear.
jpnChrName: もう、消えてしまいたい───
jpnSearchText: もう、消えてしまいたい───
…………ッ！！

engChrName: My angel... Please grant my final wish... Take my life.
engSearchText:
My angel... Please grant my final wish... Take
my life.
jpnChrName: 天使様──私を、殺してください。
jpnSearchText: 天使様──私を、殺してください。

engChrName: Oh, no!
engSearchText: Oh, no!
jpnChrName: いけません……！
jpnSearchText: いけません……！

engChrName: Haaaaah!
engSearchText: Haaaaah!
jpnChrName: ──おおおおおっ！
jpnSearchText: ──おおおおおっ！

engChrName: Van! Risette!
engSearchText: Van! Risette!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、リゼットさんも！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、リゼットさんも！

engChrName: ...?! But why...?
engSearchText: ...?! But why...?
jpnChrName: っ……！？ どうして……！
jpnSearchText:
っ……！？
どうして……！

engChrName: You thought we'd sit tight while you tried to throw your life down the drain? Well, think again!
engSearchText:
You thought we'd sit tight while you tried to throw
your life down the drain? Well, think again!
jpnChrName: せっかく取り戻したんだろう……！？ 簡単に手放そうとしてんじゃねえ！
jpnSearchText:
せっかく取り戻したんだろう……！？
簡単に手放そうとしてんじゃねえ！

engChrName: I know the pain hurts like hell—but you'll just have to live with it!
engSearchText:
I know the pain hurts like hell—but you'll
just have to live with it!
jpnChrName: 辛ぇだろうしキツいんだろう！ だがそれがお前が生きてきた“世界”だ！
jpnSearchText:
辛ぇだろうしキツいんだろう！
だがそれがお前が生きてきた“世界”だ！

engChrName: You only just got your heart back, so now your life can truly begin. Embrace the truths about yourself, don't run away from them!
engSearchText:
You only just got your heart back, so now your life
can truly begin. Embrace the truths about yourself,
don't run away from them!
jpnChrName: 貴女はここからです── まずはご自分と向き合ってください！！
jpnSearchText:
貴女はここからです──
まずはご自分と向き合ってください！！
………………！

engChrName: I don't believe it's very happy with us right now.
engSearchText: I don't believe it's very happy with us right now.
jpnChrName: ……どうやら 敵と認識されたみたいだね……！
jpnSearchText:
……どうやら
敵と認識されたみたいだね……！

engChrName: I doubt it will cease its assault until we destroy it—or until it destroys us.
engSearchText:
I doubt it will cease its assault until we destroy it—or
until it destroys us.
jpnChrName: わたくしたちを今度こそ 完全に排除するつもりでしょう……
jpnSearchText:
わたくしたちを今度こそ
完全に排除するつもりでしょう……

engChrName: It is determined to keep its master and daughter from living a normal life. And I can't accept that.
engSearchText:
It is determined to keep its master and daughter from
living a normal life. And I can't accept that.
jpnChrName: 主にして娘でもある“彼女”を 永遠に人の生から遠ざけるために──！
jpnSearchText:
主にして娘でもある“彼女”を
永遠に人の生から遠ざけるために──！

engChrName: You said it! She just can't let her darling baby bird leave the nest.
engSearchText:
You said it! She just can't let her darling baby bird
leave the nest.
jpnChrName: ハッ、とんだ過保護ママだこと！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、とんだ過保護ママだこと！

engChrName: What a terrible mother!
engSearchText: What a terrible mother!
jpnChrName: そんな母（アマ）の愛、間違ってますっ！
jpnSearchText: そんな母（アマ）の愛、間違ってますっ！

engChrName: I say it's high time we terminate its parental rights. Let's pulverize this hunk of junk!
engSearchText:
I say it's high time we terminate its parental rights.
Let's pulverize this hunk of junk!
jpnChrName: だったら今度こそ完全に 止めるまでだ──行くぞ！！
jpnSearchText:
だったら今度こそ完全に
止めるまでだ──行くぞ！！
（……ッ……しまっ──）

engChrName: I have my own guardian angel.
engSearchText: I have my own guardian angel.
jpnChrName: 私には天使様が付いています。
jpnSearchText: 私には天使様が付いています。

engChrName: The people of my village revere my angel as a divine messenger in a small temple.
engSearchText:
The people of my village revere my angel as a divine
messenger in a small temple.
jpnChrName: 小さな神殿で“神の御使い様”として 村人たちから崇められる天使様。
jpnSearchText:
小さな神殿で“神の御使い様”として
村人たちから崇められる天使様。

engChrName: Though for some reason, only I can hear its voice.
engSearchText: Though for some reason, only I can hear its voice.
jpnChrName: なぜか私だけ、その声が聞こえました。
jpnSearchText: なぜか私だけ、その声が聞こえました。

engChrName: With the passing of the seasons, the children around me disappeared without a trace—one after another.
engSearchText:
With the passing of the seasons, the children around
me disappeared without a trace—one after another.
jpnChrName: 季節が次々と変わり、周りの子たちが 一人、また一人と消えました。
jpnSearchText:
季節が次々と変わり、周りの子たちが
一人、また一人と消えました。

engChrName: Then, on one fateful day, my turn came.
engSearchText: Then, on one fateful day, my turn came.
jpnChrName: しばらくして、ついに私の番が来ました。
jpnSearchText: しばらくして、ついに私の番が来ました。

engChrName: My mom and dad tried to fight for me. They stood against the other adults in the village—all to protect me.
engSearchText:
My mom and dad tried to fight for me. They stood
against the other adults in the village—all to
protect me.
jpnChrName: お父さんとお母さんは私を守ろうとしました。 他の大人たちに必死に抵抗しました。
jpnSearchText:
お父さんとお母さんは私を守ろうとしました。
他の大人たちに必死に抵抗しました。

engChrName: But they didn't stand a chance. Both were murdered.
engSearchText: But they didn't stand a chance. Both were murdered.
jpnChrName: そして、二人とも殺されました。
jpnSearchText: そして、二人とも殺されました。

engChrName: 'I can't go on... This pain is just...too much!'
engSearchText: 'I can't go on... This pain is just...too much!'
jpnChrName: 『いや……こんな気持ち、もういや……』
jpnSearchText: 『いや……こんな気持ち、もういや……』

engChrName: In that moment, I turned to the angel and made one simple wish.
engSearchText:
In that moment, I turned to the angel and made one
simple wish.
jpnChrName: 私は、天使様に願いました。
jpnSearchText: 私は、天使様に願いました。

engChrName: 'I don't want to feel anything anymore. Take it all away.'
engSearchText:
'I don't want to feel anything anymore. Take it
all away.'
jpnChrName: 『もう何も感じたくない……   何も、何も、何も──』
jpnSearchText:
『もう何も感じたくない……
何も、何も、何も──』

engChrName: The angel heard my plea and responded to my request. It then began moving however I wanted it to.
engSearchText:
The angel heard my plea and responded to
my request. It then began moving however I wanted
it to.
jpnChrName: 気がついたら、天使様が動いていました。 私の思うままに、動いていました。
jpnSearchText:
気がついたら、天使様が動いていました。
私の思うままに、動いていました。

engChrName: This sent the adults into a panicked frenzy. They desperately tried to separate us.
engSearchText:
This sent the adults into a panicked frenzy.
They desperately tried to separate us.
jpnChrName: 大人たちは驚き、慌てました。 私を天使様から引き剥がそうとしました。
jpnSearchText:
大人たちは驚き、慌てました。
私を天使様から引き剥がそうとしました。

engChrName: So I killed them. And I felt nothing at all.
engSearchText: So I killed them. And I felt nothing at all.
jpnChrName: 全員殺しました。何も感じなかった。
jpnSearchText: 全員殺しました。何も感じなかった。

engChrName: I left the village and wandered outside alone. After a while, I stumbled into some rough-looking men.
engSearchText:
I left the village and wandered outside alone. After a
while, I stumbled into some rough-looking men.
jpnChrName: 一人で外をさまよっていると、 乱暴そうな男の人たちに会いました。
jpnSearchText:
一人で外をさまよっていると、
乱暴そうな男の人たちに会いました。

engChrName: They tried to steal from me—and make me do things I had no desire to do.
engSearchText:
They tried to steal from me—and make me do things
I had no desire to do.
jpnChrName: 私から何かを奪おうと、私に何かを 無理矢理しようとした人たちでした。
jpnSearchText:
私から何かを奪おうと、私に何かを
無理矢理しようとした人たちでした。

engChrName: So I killed them, too. And I felt nothing at all.
engSearchText: So I killed them, too. And I felt nothing at all.
jpnChrName: 全員殺しました。どうでも良かった。
jpnSearchText: 全員殺しました。どうでも良かった。

engChrName: What an astonishing display of power! Never have I seen anyone synchronize so well with an artifact.
engSearchText:
What an astonishing display of power! Never have I
seen anyone synchronize so well with an artifact.
jpnChrName: ──素晴らしい力だ！ “遺物”との同調がこれほどとは！
jpnSearchText:
──素晴らしい力だ！
“遺物”との同調がこれほどとは！

engChrName: I am the Emperor. Come with me, dear child—the Gardens shall welcome you with open arms.
engSearchText:
I am the Emperor. Come with me, dear child—the
Gardens shall welcome you with open arms.
jpnChrName: 我が名は《皇帝（エンペラー）》、我と一緒に来い！ 《庭園（ガーデン）》が君を歓迎する──
jpnSearchText:
我が名は《皇帝（エンペラー）》、我と一緒に来い！
《庭園（ガーデン）》が君を歓迎する──

engChrName: He was the overseer of the Garden of Swords. Several years after we first met, he died at the hands of two traitors he was pursuing.
engSearchText:
He was the overseer of the Garden of Swords.
Several years after we first met, he died at the hands
of two traitors he was pursuing.
jpnChrName: 数年後、《剣の園》の管理人である彼は 脱走者の返り討ちに遭って死にました。
jpnSearchText:
数年後、《剣の園》の管理人である彼は
脱走者の返り討ちに遭って死にました。

engChrName: And again, I felt nothing. But I still remember something he once told me.
engSearchText:
And again, I felt nothing. But I still remember
something he once told me.
jpnChrName: 特に何も感じなかった。 ですが、彼の言葉を思い出しました。
jpnSearchText:
特に何も感じなかった。
ですが、彼の言葉を思い出しました。

engChrName: You are very much like an infant... No—you are like one who has never left her mother's womb.
engSearchText:
You are very much like an infant... No—you are like
one who has never left her mother's womb.
jpnChrName: ──君は幼子のようなものだ。 いいや、生まれてすらいないと言えよう。
jpnSearchText:
──君は幼子のようなものだ。
いいや、生まれてすらいないと言えよう。

engChrName: Your life will never truly begin until you can once again feel the emotions you now lack.
engSearchText:
Your life will never truly begin until you can once
again feel the emotions you now lack.
jpnChrName: 喜怒哀楽を感じられるようになって 初めて君は“生き始める”であろうな。
jpnSearchText:
喜怒哀楽を感じられるようになって
初めて君は“生き始める”であろうな。

engChrName: And that day will never come as long as that angel is by your side.
engSearchText:
And that day will never come as long as that angel is
by your side.
jpnChrName: まあ、その“天使”がいる限り無理な話か。
jpnSearchText: まあ、その“天使”がいる限り無理な話か。

engChrName: Ohh...
engSearchText: Ohh...
jpnSearchText: ああ…………

engChrName: Ishtanti... My angel...
engSearchText: Ishtanti... My angel...
jpnChrName: イシュタンティ……私の、天使様…………
jpnSearchText: イシュタンティ……私の、天使様…………

engChrName: You can't just leave me all alone... Please! Don't abandon me!
engSearchText:
You can't just leave me all alone... Please!
Don't abandon me!
jpnChrName: そんな……そんな…… 私を……置いていかないで……！
jpnSearchText:
そんな……そんな……
私を……置いていかないで……！

engChrName: Come back! Or take me with you! I don't want to feel any of this!
engSearchText:
Come back! Or take me with you! I don't want to feel
any of this!
jpnChrName: い、いやだ！　いやだ！ 感情なんて、私……
jpnSearchText:
い、いやだ！　いやだ！
感情なんて、私……

engChrName: Sorry, but your angel buddy's gone for good. Nothing's gonna shelter you from the real world now.
engSearchText:
Sorry, but your angel buddy's gone for good.
Nothing's gonna shelter you from the real world now.
jpnChrName: ……天使様はもういない。 “殻”として、お前さんを覆うものもな。
jpnSearchText:
……天使様はもういない。
“殻”として、お前さんを覆うものもな。

engChrName: Which means you gotta reach out and get a feel for it yourself. You're a human now just like the rest of us. So it's time to start livin' a little.
engSearchText:
Which means you gotta reach out and get a feel for
it yourself. You're a human now just like the rest
of us. So it's time to start livin' a little.
jpnChrName: これからは自分で世界に接して、世界を感じろ。 もうお前さんは、一人の人間だ。
jpnSearchText:
これからは自分で世界に接して、世界を感じろ。
もうお前さんは、一人の人間だ。

engChrName: But I...I can't do that...
engSearchText: But I...I can't do that...
jpnChrName: そんなこと……私には……
jpnSearchText: そんなこと……私には……

engChrName: You absolutely can. Take me for instance. I once lost everything as well, yet I managed to pull through.
engSearchText:
You absolutely can. Take me for instance. I once lost
everything as well, yet I managed to pull through.
jpnChrName: 大丈夫──かつて喪った私ですら 取り戻すことができたのですから。
jpnSearchText:
大丈夫──かつて喪った私ですら
取り戻すことができたのですから。

engChrName: You have your eyes, ears, and limbs, and you can use them to connect with and feel the world around you.
engSearchText:
You have your eyes, ears, and limbs, and you can use
them to connect with and feel the world around you.
jpnChrName: 貴女には自分の目と耳が、手と足が、 世界の全てを感じる手段があります。
jpnSearchText:
貴女には自分の目と耳が、手と足が、
世界の全てを感じる手段があります。

engChrName: They can also help you remember what it feels like to be alive.
engSearchText:
They can also help you remember what it feels like to
be alive.
jpnChrName: 少しずつでもそれを通じて 生きている実感を取り戻してください。
jpnSearchText:
少しずつでもそれを通じて
生きている実感を取り戻してください。

engChrName: Your life is now yours to live.
engSearchText: Your life is now yours to live.
jpnChrName: ──貴女は生きているのですから。
jpnSearchText: ──貴女は生きているのですから。

engChrName: Alive...
engSearchText: Alive...
jpnChrName: 生きる…………
jpnSearchText: 生きる…………

engChrName: That's right. I'm...alive.
engSearchText: That's right. I'm...alive.
jpnChrName: そうか、私は……生きています……
jpnSearchText: そうか、私は……生きています……

engChrName: I'm still hurting so much...
engSearchText: I'm still hurting so much...
jpnChrName: こんなにも悲しくて苦しいのに…… 私は…………
jpnSearchText:
こんなにも悲しくて苦しいのに……
私は…………

engChrName: But I suppose that's a sign that I'm alive.
engSearchText: But I suppose that's a sign that I'm alive.
jpnChrName: 生きているんですね………………
jpnSearchText: 生きているんですね………………

engChrName: She's unconscious...
engSearchText: She's unconscious...
jpnChrName: 気を……失ったみたいですね。
jpnSearchText: 気を……失ったみたいですね。

engChrName: Man, she was more of a pain in the ass to deal with than before.
engSearchText:
Man, she was more of a pain in the ass to deal with
than before.
jpnChrName: チッ、化物じみた強さ以上に やりにくすぎる相手だったぜ……
jpnSearchText:
チッ、化物じみた強さ以上に
やりにくすぎる相手だったぜ……

engChrName: Still, I think our words were beginning to reach her.
engSearchText: Still, I think our words were beginning to reach her.
jpnChrName: ……でも…… 少しは届いていると思います。
jpnSearchText:
……でも……
少しは届いていると思います。

engChrName: Yeah. Dunno if she'll ever be able to atone for all she's done...
engSearchText:
Yeah. Dunno if she'll ever be able to atone for all
she's done...
jpnChrName: ああ、今まで背負ってきた罪を 償いきれるかどうかは分からねえが──
jpnSearchText:
ああ、今まで背負ってきた罪を
償いきれるかどうかは分からねえが──

engChrName: ...but at least now she can finally start living for real.
engSearchText:
...but at least now she can finally start living
for real.
jpnChrName: 彼女の時間は、ここから始まるだろう。
jpnSearchText: 彼女の時間は、ここから始まるだろう。

engChrName: I hope you're right about that.
engSearchText: I hope you're right about that.
jpnChrName: ……そうだといいね。
jpnSearchText: ……そうだといいね。

engChrName: Wonderful. Now I'll never have to feel anything ever again...
engSearchText:
Wonderful. Now I'll never have to feel anything
ever again...
jpnChrName: これで……また…… 何も感じなくて……済みます……
jpnSearchText:
これで……また……
何も感じなくて……済みます……

engChrName: Thank you so much, Ishtanti...
engSearchText: Thank you so much, Ishtanti...
jpnChrName: ありがとう……イシュタンティ………
jpnSearchText: ありがとう……イシュタンティ………
──────────

engChrName: I hope she can finally rest in peace—even if she will not be at the Goddess' side.
engSearchText:
I hope she can finally rest in peace—even if she will
not be at the Goddess' side.
jpnChrName: ……せめて安らかに……… たとえ女神の下でなくとも……
jpnSearchText:
……せめて安らかに………
たとえ女神の下でなくとも……

engChrName: Risette...
engSearchText: Risette...
jpnChrName: リゼットさん……
jpnSearchText: リゼットさん……

engChrName: (Damn it! Why the hell did I just stand there? I could've done something!)
engSearchText:
(Damn it! Why the hell did I just stand there?
I could've done something!)
jpnChrName: （……クソ……   何をやってんだ、俺は……）
jpnSearchText:
（……クソ……
何をやってんだ、俺は……）

jpnChrName: （ヴァンさん……）
jpnSearchText: （ヴァンさん……）

engChrName: (It is as I feared, then...)
engSearchText: (It is as I feared, then...)
jpnSearchText: （……やはり、まだ………）

engChrName: The lower zone boss Olympia has been defeated. Zone clear. Round three complete.
engSearchText:
The lower zone boss Olympia has been defeated.
Zone clear. Round three complete.
jpnChrName: 下層担当者オランピア　脱落 領域クリア　第３フェーズ終了
jpnSearchText:
下層担当者オランピア　脱落
領域クリア　第３フェーズ終了

engChrName: And the winner of our game is Team Arkride Solutions. Congratulations.
engSearchText:
And the winner of our game is Team
Arkride Solutions. Congratulations.
jpnChrName: おめでとう、アークライド解決事務所。 お前たちがゲームの勝者だ。
jpnSearchText:
おめでとう、アークライド解決事務所。
お前たちがゲームの勝者だ。

engChrName: Dantès!
engSearchText: Dantès!
jpnChrName: ジェラール……！！
jpnSearchText: ジェラール……！！

engChrName: So our ever-elusive host makes his second appearance at the last minute. Didn't want to leave the final felicitations to your subordinates, eh?
engSearchText:
So our ever-elusive host makes his second appearance
at the last minute. Didn't want to leave the final
felicitations to your subordinates, eh?
jpnChrName: ……最後は部下ではなく、 主催者自ら出張ってきたか。
jpnSearchText:
……最後は部下ではなく、
主催者自ら出張ってきたか。

engChrName: Indeed. It would be quite remiss of me to not congratulate the winners in person—so to speak.
engSearchText:
Indeed. It would be quite remiss of me to not
congratulate the winners in person—so to speak.
jpnChrName: ああ──どうしても俺自身の口から 祝いの言葉を贈りたかったからな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──どうしても俺自身の口から
祝いの言葉を贈りたかったからな。

engChrName: This game turned out to be quite the spectacle thanks to you. First, you exploited that loophole to recruit allies...
engSearchText:
This game turned out to be quite the spectacle thanks
to you. First, you exploited that loophole to
recruit allies...
jpnChrName: いい見せ物だったぞ、ヴァン・アークライド。 ルールの穴を突いて協力者を得たことも──
jpnSearchText:
いい見せ物だったぞ、ヴァン・アークライド。
ルールの穴を突いて協力者を得たことも──

engChrName: ...then you defeated fearsome foe after fearsome foe using your quick wits and ample strategies. You kept me thoroughly entertained throughout.
engSearchText:
...then you defeated fearsome foe after fearsome foe
using your quick wits and ample strategies. You kept
me thoroughly entertained throughout.
jpnChrName: その後数々の機転で強敵を退けたことも、 実に俺を楽しませてくれた。
jpnSearchText:
その後数々の機転で強敵を退けたことも、
実に俺を楽しませてくれた。

engChrName: The rest of the teams also did well to liven up the proceedings—with special mention going to Beauty's Blade.
engSearchText:
The rest of the teams also did well to liven up the
proceedings—with special mention going to
Beauty's Blade.
jpnChrName: 礼を言う──他の面々や剣の乙女も含め 悪くない盛り上がりだったと誉めてやろう。
jpnSearchText:
礼を言う──他の面々や剣の乙女も含め
悪くない盛り上がりだったと誉めてやろう。

engChrName: Oh, right. As I recall, Melchior did a brief question-and-answer session on the first day.
engSearchText:
Oh, right. As I recall, Melchior did a brief
question-and-answer session on the first day.
jpnChrName: ああ……そういえばメルキオルが初日に “質問タイム”とやらを設けていたな？
jpnSearchText:
ああ……そういえばメルキオルが初日に
“質問タイム”とやらを設けていたな？

engChrName: Perhaps I should do the same. To commemorate your achievement, I shall answer one question of your choosing. Anything goes.
engSearchText:
Perhaps I should do the same. To commemorate your
achievement, I shall answer one question of
your choosing. Anything goes.
jpnChrName: 特別に俺も一つ答えてやろう。 褒美だ──何でも聞くがいい。
jpnSearchText:
特別に俺も一つ答えてやろう。
褒美だ──何でも聞くがいい。

engChrName: Heh. Wow, what an honor. I'll gladly take you up on your generous offer.
engSearchText:
Heh. Wow, what an honor. I'll gladly take you up on
your generous offer.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そりゃ恐悦至極だな。 てめぇに聞きたいのは一つだけだ……
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、そりゃ恐悦至極だな。
てめぇに聞きたいのは一つだけだ……

engChrName: Here's my question: are you ready to get your face caved in, Gerard Dantès?
engSearchText:
Here's my question: are you ready to get your face
caved in, Gerard Dantès?
jpnChrName: 首を洗って俺たちにやられる準備は 出来てるんだろうな──ジェラール・ダンテス！！
jpnSearchText:
首を洗って俺たちにやられる準備は
出来てるんだろうな──ジェラール・ダンテス！！

engChrName: Hahaha! I respect your daring spirit, boy.
engSearchText: Hahaha! I respect your daring spirit, boy.
jpnChrName: ハハハ、実にいい啖呵だ！
jpnSearchText: ハハハ、実にいい啖呵だ！

engChrName: To answer your question, yes, I will be fully ready for you. I would suggest you get plenty of rest before our fight.
engSearchText:
To answer your question, yes, I will be fully ready
for you. I would suggest you get plenty of rest before
our fight.
jpnChrName: お望み通り万全の態勢で迎えてやろう。 せいぜいお前たちも英気を養うがいい。
jpnSearchText:
お望み通り万全の態勢で迎えてやろう。
せいぜいお前たちも英気を養うがいい。

engChrName: The final round will begin at 3PM in Vashtar Palace—as previously noted.
engSearchText:
The final round will begin at 3PM in Vashtar
Palace—as previously noted.
jpnChrName: ──最終フェーズは午後３時に開始だ。 場所は宣告した通り《ヴァシュタール宮》。
jpnSearchText:
──最終フェーズは午後３時に開始だ。
場所は宣告した通り《ヴァシュタール宮》。

engChrName: Follow the path directly ahead of you, and you will find an elevator that will take you to the center of the palace.
engSearchText:
Follow the path directly ahead of you, and you will
find an elevator that will take you to the center of
the palace.
jpnChrName: お前たちがいるその更に奥に、 王宮中央に直接通じる昇降機がある。
jpnSearchText:
お前たちがいるその更に奥に、
王宮中央に直接通じる昇降機がある。

engChrName: I shall await your arrival with eager anticipation. Find me in the throne room, and we shall commence this carnival's explosive finale.
engSearchText:
I shall await your arrival with eager anticipation.
Find me in the throne room, and we shall commence
this carnival's explosive finale.
jpnChrName: それでは“玉座”で待っているぞ── 謝肉祭（カルナヴァル）を最高の形で締めくくるためにな！
jpnSearchText:
それでは“玉座”で待っているぞ──
謝肉祭（カルナヴァル）を最高の形で締めくくるためにな！

engChrName: Afterwards, their allies—who had been keeping Marduk occupied—finally caught up with them.
engSearchText:
Afterwards, their allies—who had been keeping
Marduk occupied—finally caught up with them.
jpnChrName: その後、マルドゥック社を足止めしていた 協力者たちも追いついてきた。
jpnSearchText:
その後、マルドゥック社を足止めしていた
協力者たちも追いついてきた。

engChrName: They returned to the surface, carrying Olympia's remains with them.
engSearchText:
They returned to the surface, carrying Olympia's
remains with them.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちはオランピアの亡骸を 丁重に運びつつ、地上に戻り──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちはオランピアの亡骸を
丁重に運びつつ、地上に戻り──

engChrName: After taking a short rest, they began preparing for the final round.
engSearchText:
After taking a short rest, they began preparing for the
final round.
jpnChrName: しばしの休憩の後、最終フェーズに 向けての準備を始めるのだった。
jpnSearchText:
しばしの休憩の後、最終フェーズに
向けての準備を始めるのだった。

engChrName: But they were then left with a pressing conundrum: 'Who should take custody of Olympia?'
engSearchText:
But they were then left with a pressing conundrum:
'Who should take custody of Olympia?'
jpnChrName: そして──オランピアの身柄については、 ヴァンの判断に委ねられることになるのだった。
jpnSearchText:
そして──オランピアの身柄については、
ヴァンの判断に委ねられることになるのだった。

engChrName: (She might be unconscious right now, but she's still a real threat. Someone needs to keep a watchful eye on her till this is over.)
engSearchText:
(She might be unconscious right now, but she's still a
real threat. Someone needs to keep a watchful eye on
her till this is over.)
jpnChrName: （無力化したとはいえアルマータの幹部……   ゲームが終わるまで拘束する必要があるだろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（無力化したとはいえアルマータの幹部……
ゲームが終わるまで拘束する必要があるだろう。）

engChrName: (And that someone can't be us. Can't afford to split my team. I should hand her over to a group with more manpower...but who?)
engSearchText:
(And that someone can't be us. Can't afford to split
my team. I should hand her over to a group with
more manpower...but who?)
